programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Documentary following Texas game wardens as they fight crime and protect natural resources. In South Texas, a warden assists in releasing cold-stunned sea turtles back into the sea. A standard patrol at a fishing spot leads to a drugs bust and a manhunt

programme.title: Alaska: Homestead Rescue

programme.sub-title: Flood, Sweat and Tears - Part One

programme.title: Treehouse Masters

programme.title: Bad Dog!

programme.title: How Do Animals Do That?

programme.title: How Do Animals Do That?

programme.title: Madhur Jaffreys Flavours of India
programme.desc: The chef visits the Punjab, where she heads to the Golden Temple in Amritsar and sees how thousands are fed in its community kitchen. In a rural part of the region she samples the rich buffalo milk used to make paneer cheese, and along the Pakistan border she discovers that towns on both sides share a common language and cuisine. First broadcast in 1995

programme.title: Desi DNA
programme.desc: The magazine visits America to meet two of Hollywoods leading plastic surgeons. Theres a report on the increasing number of people sporting Asian tattoos, performances by three of Britains most exciting poets and a trip to Copenhagen with rap group Outlandish. First broadcast in 2004

programme.title: South Asian Music at the BBC
programme.desc: To help mark 60 years of Asian broadcasting at the BBC, Asian Network DJ Bobby Friction shares his love and knowledge of South Asian music in a look back back through the archives that celebrates some of the genres most important and enduring acts from across the decades. With artists ranging from Lata Mangeshkar, Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan and Ravi Shankar right through to Asian Dub Foundation, Naughty Boy and Apache Indian, Bobbys selection highlights the vast range of musical styles and sounds

programme.title: Goodness Gracious Me
programme.desc: A look at some the funniest and most-loved moments from the award-winning comedy sketch show, including the 10 most memorable sketches as voted for by fans, featuring the likes of The Kupers/Coopers, Mr Everything Comes from India, Chunky Lafunga, Cheque Please and Competitive Mums. The programme also features a series of exclusive interviews with stars of the show, its creators and fellow comedians who are fans of the series

programme.title: Network East
programme.sub-title: Meera Syal: A Trip through the Archives - Network East
programme.desc: In a programme first broadcast in 1995, the actress takes an affectionate look back at the Asian programmes she grew up watching with her family - not always willingly - that helped shape her and many others childhoods and sense of belonging. Featuring cookery and music programmes as well as groundbreaking series like Nai Zindagi Nai Jeevan, which started out advising the UKs new arrivals how to adapt to everyday object like lamps, but quickly evolved into something far more significant

programme.title: Make Yourself at Home
programme.desc: Another chance to see the first ever episode of the series for viewers from India and Pakistan. In Hindu and Urdu. First Broadcast in 1965

programme.title: Nai Zindagi Naya Jeevan
programme.desc: A chance to see a 1970 edition of the magazine show for Hindi and Urdu-speaking viewers

programme.title: Madhur Jaffreys Flavours of India
programme.desc: The chef visits the Punjab, where she heads to the Golden Temple in Amritsar and sees how thousands are fed in its community kitchen. In a rural part of the region she samples the rich buffalo milk used to make paneer cheese, and along the Pakistan border she discovers that towns on both sides share a common language and cuisine. First broadcast in 1995

programme.title: South Asian Music at the BBC
programme.desc: To help mark 60 years of Asian broadcasting at the BBC, Asian Network DJ Bobby Friction shares his love and knowledge of South Asian music in a look back back through the archives that celebrates some of the genres most important and enduring acts from across the decades. With artists ranging from Lata Mangeshkar, Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan and Ravi Shankar right through to Asian Dub Foundation, Naughty Boy and Apache Indian, Bobbys selection highlights the vast range of musical styles and sounds

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: A tour of Britains mining heritage takes Fred from Cornwall to Scotland, where he visits sites of lead, slate, tin and coal extraction. Along the way, the machine-mad former steeplejack has a chance to man a winding engine and descends a mine shaft while strapped to the top of the cage

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc: Liz McIvor examines how the railways enabled people to live farther away from the places where they worked, visiting London and the south east of England, the nations largest commuter zone

programme.title: An Art Lovers Guide
programme.desc: Historian Janina Ramirez and art critic Alastair Sooke embark on cultural city breaks, offering insights into the most famous locations and uncovering hidden gems and untold stories to reveal how religion, revolution and trailblazing individuals can shape the art - and soul - of a metropolis. They begin by examining the art and design of the Dutch capital Amsterdam, along the way discovering how its culture reflects the liberal attitudes, appetite for global trade and love of home comforts that helped shape the character of this city

programme.title: Call My Bluff
programme.desc: Robert Robinson oversees another duel of words and wit as Frank Muir, Anna Massey and Godfrey Smith take on Arthur Marshall, Sally Magnusson and Peter Egan. First broadcast in 1984

programme.title: Face the Music
programme.desc: Joseph Cooper invites viewers to match their musical wits against panellists Joyce Grenfell, Robin Ray and Patrick Moore. With guest musician Joan Cross. First broadcast in 1973

programme.title: Arena
programme.sub-title: Billie Holiday: The Long Night of Lady Day
programme.desc: A 1984 profile of the jazz singer, from her traumatic childhood in Baltimore to her premature death in a New York hospital at the age of 44, told in the words of her closest friends and colleagues. The programme features a number of filmed performances and includes classics such as God Bless the Child, Dont Explain and Fine and Mellow

programme.title: Imagine
programme.sub-title: Marina Abramovic: The Ugly Duckling - Imagine
programme.desc: The performance artist invites Alan Yentob into her home, opens up her enormous personal archive, and travels back to her birthplace of Belgrade. Abramovic talks about her family and growing up in communist Yugoslavia, where she fell in love with performance art and became one of its most outrageous and celebrated practitioners, and discusses turning her life into art

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus current affairs, arts and entertainment, and weather

programme.title: Match of the Day
programme.desc: Gabby Logan presents highlights of the latest Premier League matches, including Chelsea v Liverpool at Stamford Bridge and Arsenal v West Ham United at Emirates Stadium. Chelsea claimed a 3-1 home win over Liverpool last term, but the Reds had already secured the league title. Arsenal had lost to London rivals West Ham in front of their own fans in each of the last two seasons. Plus, Leeds United v Tottenham Hotspur, Manchester United v Sunderland and Bournemouth v Fulham

programme.title: Sunday with Laura Kuenssberg
programme.desc: Interviews with key politicians and public figures

programme.title: Sunday Politics Northern Ireland
programme.desc: The political developments of the week, with policy-makers questioned on the key issues

programme.title: Sunday Morning Live
programme.desc: Topical debate covering religious, moral and ethical issues, with guest panellists and contributions from viewers

programme.title: Prayer and Reflection
programme.desc: A Tibetan Buddhist service from Kagyu Samye Ling Monastery in Eskdalemuir, Dumfries and Galloway. These prayers filled with chanting, mantra recitation, and symbolic offerings are intended to clear obstacles, purify the environment and cultivate compassion and postivity. The chanted prayers are accompanied by live traditional instruments and these, along with offerings, give a unique insight into the deep spiritual rhythm of Tibetan prayer and reflection

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Eric Knowles hosts as four teams hunt for bargains at Hemswell antiques centre in Lincolnshire, aided by experts Catherine Southon and Mark Stacey

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Weather for the Week Ahead
programme.desc: A look ahead to the latest forecast

programme.title: Songs of Praise
programme.sub-title: Young Chorister of the Year - Junior Semi-Final
programme.desc: Aled Jones and the Rev Kate Bottley host the junior semi-final of BBC Young Chorister of the Year, with judges Gareth Malone, Michelle John and Harry Bradford. The semi-final music includes Mozarts Laudate Dominum; Love Divine All Loves Excelling by Charles Wesley; This Day by Bob Chilcott; Benjamin Brittens The Birds and How Shall I Sing That Majesty? by Kenneth Naylor

programme.title: Points of View
programme.desc: Viewers opinions on BBC shows and behind-the-scenes reports on new programmes

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Briony May Williams helps to make dreams come true for a buyer with an ambition of moving to the North Yorkshire countryside on a £250,000 budget. Then, she takes her escapee to a farm, where they are given the special privilege of hand-feeding a five-day-old pet lamb

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A prince is transformed into a hideous monster as punishment for his selfishness, and can only regain his human form by finding true love. Salvation comes in the form of a spirited village girl, who offers to take her fathers place when he is imprisoned in the monsters castle. But as romance blossoms between the unlikely pair, a jealous rival suitor only sees a beast to be slain. Live-action remake of the Disney animated fairy tale, starring Emma Watson, Dan Stevens and Luke Evans, with Ewan McGregor, Emma Thompson and Ian McKellen playing the Beasts entourage of living ornaments

programme.title: Our Changing Planet
programme.sub-title: Our Changing Planet: Restoring Our Reefs
programme.desc: Steve Backshall meets scientists working to help save coral reefs, which are under threat from rising sea temperatures. The programme focuses on two different projects that are now combining their efforts - collecting coral spawn to maximise fertilisation and using fish vocalisations to help them grow. Plus, Liz Bonnin visits The Coral Spawning Lab in London where corals are being grown on an industrial scale

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Weather
programme.desc: The latest forecast

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: Matt Baker, Anita Rani, Sean Fletcher, Joe Crowley and John Craven lace up their walking boots and explore the border of Shropshire and Staffordshire, hearing the stories of young people whose lives have been positively impacted by Children in Need along the way

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing
programme.desc: Tess Daly and Claudia Winkleman present as the two lowest-scoring duos go head to head in the first dance-off of the series - and if the panel cannot decide who to put through, the casting vote will now be shared weekly among all the judges. Plus, a performance by Zara Larsson and a group routine

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team visit Shuttleworth House in Bedfordshire, where highlights include Little Nellie - the ultimate James Bond gadget from the film You Only Live Twice, a unique gyrocopter designed and built by aviator and inventor Ken Wallis, brought along by his daughter

programme.title: King and Conqueror
programme.desc: In a clash that defined a country, Harolds depleted English forces rush to meet Williams assault on the south coast. Historical drama, starring James Norton and Nikolaj Coster-Waldau

programme.title: Match of the Day
programme.desc: Kelly Cates presents highlights of the latest Premier League matches, including Brentford v Manchester City at Gtech Community Stadium and Newcastle United v Nottingham Forest at St James Park. Brentford fought back from 2-0 down to claim a 2-2 draw at home to the Citizens last season. The Magpies and Forest also played out a thrilling contest in last terms corresponding fixture, with Newcastle prevailing 4-3. Plus, Aston Villa v Burnley, Everton v Crystal Palace, and Wolverhampton Wanderers v Brighton and Hove Albion

programme.title: The Womens Football Show
programme.desc: Highlights of the weekends matches in the Super League, including Manchester United v Chelsea and Manchester City v Arsenal

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guy and Jamma visit Guys family home to pick up his childhood diary for writing inspiration. When Jamma meets Guys mother and brother, he makes a perfect first impression, much to Guys despair. However, all hell breaks loose when an unwelcome guest makes a frightening and confronting appearance. Mark Gatiss guest stars, with Mawaan Rizwan, Russell Tovey and Emily Lloyd-Saini

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guys book launch finds the venue double-booked with a wedding. When the bride goes missing, its Jammas time to shine - he goes to look for her to save both the launch and the wedding. Elsewhere, its still awkward between Winnie and Isaac after their near kiss, while Farida uses the launch as her chance to get Saif to sign the divorce papers. Comedy, starring Mawaan Rizwan, Russell Tovey and Emily Lloyd-Saini

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show
programme.desc: The host welcomes global music star Taylor Swift, inviting her to discuss her album The Life of a Showgirl. Also appearing are Oscar-winner Cillian Murphy, who is playing the head teacher in reform school drama Steve and actors Greta Lee and Jodie Turner-Smith, who are appearing together in sci-fi reboot Tron: Ares. Plus, Domhnall Gleeson talks about his new comedy role in The Office spin-off The Paper and Lewis Capaldi performs Something in the Heavens

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Gethin Jones and Louise Minchin present the weekday magazine show featuring a mixture of topical discussion and expert advice for viewers

programme.title: Crimewatch Live
programme.desc: Rav Wilding and Steph McGovern present appeals for information from the public about crimes around the country. They begin with a heartfelt plea from the mother of 19-year-old Ellis Cox, who was shot in Merseyside in 2024. Plus, the nationwide hunt for a couple who went on the run with their newborn baby

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Martin Roberts, Tommy Walsh and Dion Dublin follow the fortunes of more properties being sold at auction. Martin is in Folkestone, Kent, to visit a two-bed maisonette taken on by a builder with an interesting hobby, Tommy is in Norwich to see a grade two listing with bags of charm and potential, while Dion is in Wigan, Greater Manchester, to see a three-bed terrace riddled with damp but with great development potential

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: David Harper hosts as Kate Bliss and Thomas Forrester help two teams scour Builth Wells antiques fair and pick up bargains to sell for profit at auction. Bank managers and friends Rose and Sharon on the red team find a rusty planter in the shape of a bicycle while couple Rae and Henry on the blue team are fascinated by a ceramic bed warmer

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC Newsline; Weather
programme.desc: Local news worth watching from across Northern Ireland

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Trace, Track, Get My Car Back
programme.desc: Documentary following teams of investigators who employ trackers using hi-tech methods to hunt down stolen vehicles. Tracker Neil and his team are closing in on a Land Rover linked to a spate of street robberies in Manchester. With the car in their sights, they call for police back-up

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Amanda Holden and Alan Carr set about renovating the bathrooms. Amanda has big plans converting one of the medieval tower rooms into a double height sumptuous en-suite complete with a Botticelli mural, roll-top bath and a gold resin floor, while Alan has the challenging task of transforming the small-sized bathroom into a minimalist wet room. Things dont get off to the best of starts for Alan as he dismantles the old toilet, while Amanda discovers the ceiling she hoped to take down holds the tower together. To lift their spirits, the duo send time at the picturesque medieval town of San Gimignano

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: City-dwelling families, couples and individuals set out to find their ideal rural retreats with the help of a property expert

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Sonnaz Nooranvary restores a pair of cinema seats from 1947 and Kirsten Ramsay repairs a ceramic Buddha statue that has been passed through the same family for 70 years. Tim Gunn is tasked with bringing a cherished polo bike and mallet back to its former glory

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz show where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret stash of cash, anything between zero and £4,000. Each player only knows their own value before being thrown into a battle of wits, nerve, and strategic gameplay across a series of challenging rounds

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong and Angela Rippon co-host the quiz in which four pairs of contestants have to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious answers to questions posed to 100 people before the show. At the end of each round, the team with the most points is eliminated until the final two pairs battle for a cash prize

programme.title: BBC News at Six; Weather
programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Alex Jones and Roman Kemp present the first visit of the week to the One Show studio, featuring the usual mix of topical stories and celebrity chat

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: The Mitchells join forces to support Callum, Harrys happiness is short-lived when a worrying situation comes to light, and Suki extends an olive branch

programme.title: Panorama
programme.desc: EastEnders actor Kellie Bright meets parents who say theyre exhausted by the fight to get the right education for their autistic children. She follows three families who are applying to their councils for an Education, Health, and Care Plan, a crucial document which says where a child goes to school and what extra support they should get. Kellie learns that a crisis in funding for children with special educational needs and disabilities is contributing to financial trouble for many local authorities and that the government is promising reform. Filmed over six months and drawing on her own experience as a mother to an autistic son, Kellie helps the children explain in their own words why they find school so hard and finds out what they and their parents think would help them to cope better and thrive

programme.title: Blue Lights
programme.desc: A car crash has traumatic consequences for Aisling, while the fallout creates a deadly situation for the section. Grace turns to child protection to try to help Lindsay

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: Stitched Up? Surgery in the Sun
programme.desc: Aoife Moore is in Istanbul with Martin who is getting Turkey teeth and Chloe, who is there for a boob job. She also speaks to Lauren who is undergoing emergency surgery at home after her mummy makeover abroad led to sepsis

programme.title: Trying
programme.desc: With the adoption panel only a week away, Nikki decides to get both families on board and hosts a party for both her and Jasons parents

programme.title: Trying
programme.desc: Nikki is annoyed that Freddy is making himself at home since being thrown out by Erica. Meanwhile, with the help of adoption agency, it is time for Nikki and Jason to face the adoption panel.

programme.title: Have I Got News for You
programme.desc: Victoria Coren Mitchell fronts the satirical current affairs quiz, as it returns for its 70th run. Team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton are joined by actress Sheila Hancock and actor and comedian Miles Jupp to poke fun at the weeks headlines

programme.title: The Celebrity Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz show where contestants and their celebrity partners must outsmart each other to win a cash prize. Featuring Kaye Adams, Jeff Brazier, Lauren Layfield, Zara McDermott, Jenny Powell and Lou Sanders

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: EastEnders

programme.title: Blackmailed: The Sextortion Killers
programme.desc: Reporter Tir Dhondy investigates the rise of sextortion scams targeting teenage boys on social media, including the case of 16-year-old victim Evan Boettler. programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island: Australia

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island: Australia

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Comedy, written by and starring Mawaan Rizwan, following one mans quest for attention from anyone wholl give it to him. After splitting up with Guy, Jamma is now between jobs and sleeping on Winnies sofa. However, when he unexpectedly sees Guy for the first time in six months at Isaacs pop-up art exhibition, the spark between the exes is undeniable. To Jamma and Guys surprise a handsome stranger takes a special interest in their relationship status. With Russell Tovey

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guys double-booked himself, so asks Jamma to house-sit and let a builder in. Jamma finds Guys manuscript about exes, but on discovering hes not included is sent into a spiral. Isaac comes over to calm Jamma down, but the pair discover Saif pampering himself in the house. Farida arrives with divorce papers and a new showbiz career to show off about. Sitcom, written by and starring Mawaan Rizwan and Russell Tovey

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guy doesnt want to see Jamma anymore, so when Jamma meets a magical stranger who offers to unburden him from his clownish ways to win Guy back, he decides to take the deal and is transformed. Guy has a photo shoot for his book cover, but doesnt want to look boring, so Isaac offers to style him in exchange for free therapy. Comedy, co-written by and starring Mawaan Rizwan, with Russell Tovey

programme.desc: A look at the life of the 17th-century military and political leader, following him as he challenges Charles I in the English Civil War, and ultimately orders the kings execution. Plus, the programme meets a bunch of oddly named Puritan soldiers, and the great writers Shakespeare and Milton square up for a word battle

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.sub-title: Horrible Histories: Tricky Queen Vicky Special
programme.desc: The life and times of Queen Victoria, following her as she ascends the throne at 18, marries her true love Albert, and has to put up with the open sewers at Buckingham Palace. The programme also catches up with Australian outlaw Ned Kelly, and discovers plans for the Great Hedge of India. Starring Sarah Hadland

But when they demand to see him actually do something heroic, Mush-Mush feels he can’t back out. / Chanterelle has built a whistle that can reproduce the most beautiful sound of the forest: the one of the Nightingale. / Wanting to rush off to climb Mush Mountain, Mush-Mush is in a hurry checking nectar level in flowers – a job that takes time and care.

She then cycles off before telling him what a sipping host does. Love Monster goes to Elder Panda to ask his advice, and he tells him there are many ways to serve hot chocolate - each person needs to find their own unique way. Elder Panda adds honey and banana from his garden to his. Love Monster starts the ceremony by adding his signature marshmallows, but then Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny announces she puts marshmallows in hers too. Love Monster thinks he needs to use something more unusual, so he adds pickles, but this doesnt go down well - in fact, it tastes horrible! It turns out the reason why he was chosen was so that he could make hot chocolate the way he always makes it. He does, and everyone loves it.

programme.sub-title: 24 Hours in Police Custody: Murder Is No Game
programme.desc: Two-part special following the investigation into one of the biggest murder inquiries ever conducted by the Bedfordshire Police. . On Friday 13 September 2024, police receive a 999 call from a block of flats after gunshots are heard. Bedfordshire Police immediately scramble all available resources to the scene. Its clear that the shots have killed some of the occupants

programme.desc: Investigating the disappearances of 67 different young women in Australias Byron Bay. All aged between 14 and 20, Jeremy Buckingham leads an investigation into their suspiciously similar cases that have all gone unsolved. Family members of the missing women share their grief and fight for answers. As the investigation deepens a potential link to Ivan Milat, Australias most notorious serial killer, is found

programme.title: Murder in Paradise: The Byron Bay Killings

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: As Thanksgiving arrives at the Goldberg family home, Pop-Pop and Uncle Marvin each find a way to disrupt Beverlys carefully made plans

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: When a publisher shows interest in her recipes, Beverly prepares to finally realise her dream of writing a cookbook. Meanwhile, Geoff finds himself caught between Erica and Barry

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Englishman Andrew and his Sweden-born wife Sophia kick off the competition in Glasgow, with a Swedish-inspired menu. On the second night, Brian and Victoria host with a vaguely Scottish theme, but things dont exactly go as planned when Andrew reveals he doesnt like spice or lentils, both of which are on the menu. Finally, its David and Sarahs turn to impress with a menu that represents their heritage, with dishes from Russia, Armenia and a Scottish/American dessert

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Contestants from in and around Glasgow compete for the cash prize of £1,000. Mandi and Ally kick off proceedings with some family favourites, including some Scottish charcuterie. Next, Judith and Charlene host an evening full of revelations, while on the final day, Lucy and Stephen risk it all with an exotic menu inspired by Lucys travels to Asia

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples from around Bristol and Bath compete for the £1,000 cash prize. Golf fanatics Sam and Kelly host first, with a suitably themed menu. On night two, bohemians Brian and Mandie have a festival theme, but their love of all things musical and dance sends dog food entrepreneur Dylan into a cold sweat, until their entertainment gets him shaking his booty. On night three, Dylan and holistic canine nutritionist Emma feed their guests food theyd be happy to serve to their dogs - asking everyone has to wear dog collars and doggie masks to add to the experience

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples from in and around Bristol compete for the cash prize of £1,000. The first hosts, fitness fanatics Billy and Tasha, serve up a Thai menu. Unfortunately, music-loving Dennis and Tina arent impressed. On night two, hosts Dennis and Tina bring some razzle dazzle to proceedings, but former news reporter Keith and his wife Jane prove hard to please. Finally, Keith and Janes night doesnt go according to plan, as Keith goes full-on Alan Partridge

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef travels to Flamangos restaurant in Whitehouse, New Jersey, where he tries to help the mother-and-daughter owners turn around their struggling businesss fortunes. He faces a struggle because parent Adelle has a bad relationship with her staff and is disappointed by the resident chef, leaving Gordon with the added challenge of changing her attitude

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay gives his advice to Paul Bazzini, an award-winning chef from New York who now owns a restaurant in Ridgewood, New Jersey. Paul confesses he has lost his passion for food and is struggling to keep up with the business, a situation that seems evident to other members of staff, his wife and customers

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Mojito, a Cuban cafe in Brooklyn, New York. The restaurant was the shared dream of two newlyweds who have separated since its opening, and whose constant public quarrelling is distracting staff and driving customers away

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits PJs Steakhouse in Queens, New York, to provide his expert advice to the owners. They decided to turn a successful bar into a high-end restaurant, but without any previous experience in managing a business they found themselves seriously in debt. With an over-confident chef and a partner propping up the bar, co-owner Madalyn faces a few difficult decisions

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Florida to help the owners of Fleming, a Danish restaurant in Miami. A husband-and-wife duo bought the business eight years ago in the hope of continuing the places success, but started losing money rapidly. With a Cuban chef cooking Nordic cuisine and a filthy kitchen, things go from bad to worse until it all comes to a head on relaunch night

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Jefferson, Louisiana, to help relaunch traditional Southern cuisine restaurant 3 Southern Girls, which is owned and run by Gabi, with the help of her sister Tia and best friend Monchel. After a car accident left Gabis son Makhi fighting for his life, the business was forced to close its shutters for more than a month. Now that Makhi has overcome his injuries, Gordon sets about helping self-confessed control freak Gabi rebuild the restaurant and make a successful comeback

programme.title: Taskmaster Bleeped
programme.desc: No-naughty-bits version. As Greg Davies continues to judge the attempts of five comics who are attempting to complete his nonsensical tasks, hes learning a lot about the group. For example, Reece Shearsmith reacts strangely to insects, Phil Ellis and Maisie Adam are repulsed by olives, and Sanjeev Bhaskar can remain remarkably calm in the face of a teammates incompetence. Meanwhile, Alex Horne regrets giving Ania Magliano access to his phone

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts a hybrid of the comedy panel show and the words-and-numbers quiz, as Sarah Millican and Tom Allen take on Joe Wilkinson and Rosie Jones. Mathematician Rachel Riley looks after the letters and numbers, while Mr Swallow joins lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner

programme.title: Jon Richardson: Old Man Tour
programme.desc: A chance to see a live performance recorded at Blackpools historic Grand Theatre, on what was the final night of the comedians sell-out, 158-date UK and Ireland tour. Here, Jon takes to the stage to comment - and generally complain - on topics including parenthood, Brexit and haircuts. The question of why nobody but him can correctly load a dishwasher is also raised. Alas, Jon can offer no solutions to all the problems he identifies, but nevertheless provides plenty of mirth as he fails to reach a viable conclusion to his grouses

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr oversees the disputes and deliberations as Sarah Millican, Joe Wilkinson, Nick Grimshaw and Ollie Locke join team captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson to answer questions about topical events that fascinate the great British public

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: The guys attach balloons to strangers and compliment each other on their peculiar clothes

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: The guys try to get fake books published, and walk around a pool in blacked-out sunglasses. Plus, the loser must carry out break dancing

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: There is a supermarket challenge, strangers must settle crazy debates and the loser delivers a questionable computer presentation

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q get eaten alive leading a business lunch, and trip over their own feet selling running shoes, while one joker loses his dignity in a crowded shop

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: The guys work as bellhops, serve up trouble as hot dog vendors, and go head-to-head presenting odd inventions to a focus group

programme.title: Impractical Jokers

programme.title: Robot Chicken

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: After Adam decides to see the movie Willow instead of spending Mothers Day with Beverly, he must find a way to get back into her good graces. Barry is tired of his status as middle child and fights Erica for his right to the college of his choice

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam unintentionally lets it slip that Barry never completed his community service requirement. Erica makes plans for her and Geoff to follow The Grateful Dead all summer, while Barry and his friends graduate from high school.

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Barney misinterprets the way Marshall and Lily do their household chores and wrongly suspects they are heading for divorce, while Ted learns Robin and Barney may not be as happy as they appear

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Barney reverts to his old ways following his break-up with Robin, and goes in search of new women. He sleeps with a friend of Lilys she had hoped Ted would date, so to pay him back she steals his playbook, which contains all the scams he uses to trick women into bed. Comedy, starring Neil Patrick Harris and Alyson Hannigan

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: First of a two-part special in which Gordon Ramsay heads to the Burger Kitchen in Los Angeles, where tensions are running high because owner Alan Saffron has spent his sons entire inheritance on the struggling restaurant. To make matters worse, the kitchen is run by a chef called David Blaine who shares nothing of his famous namesakes magic when it comes to cooking - and whose threatening behaviour regularly gets him into trouble

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples in Luton, Bedfordshire, battle it out in the culinary contest, beginning with Bridget and her husband Peter, whose menu of tried and tested dinner party favourites leaves their rivals distinctly unimpressed. Next to host are Shawn and Kendra, who prepare dishes based on their travels, before serving up a dessert that reflects their Canadian heritage. Finally, footballer Richard and his fiancee Marina decide to cook an Italian-inspired meal - but Richard proves to be more of a hindrance than a help in the kitchen. With the trio of parties complete, the couples reconvene to decide which pair hosted the best event

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Ben and Ambika kick off the competition in Hertfordshire with a south-east Asian menu. Their guests are Sinead from Northern Ireland and her prank-loving partner Tony, and competitive couple Kally and Mark. The lads bond over football, and by the end of the night Tony has played a prank or two setting the tone for the week. Subsequently, Kally and Mark put on an Anglo-Indian menu, but things soon get heated in the kitchen. Then, Tony and Sinead serve up an Irish menu, with silly dances, silly jokes and silly accents. However, it remains to be seen which couple will pocket the prize for best soiree

programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride
programme.desc: The show heads to Kirkintilloch on the outskirts of Glasgow to visit a couple who met at a party at the towns miners club. The would-be bride grew up in the citys fashionable West End, and dreams of a glamorous wedding day. However, the groom-to-be is a local boy whose idea of a perfect reception consists of drinks at his favourite pub

programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride
programme.desc: A 22-year-old man hopes to give his fiancee of four months her perfect wedding. However, while bride Alex dreams of being surrounded by friends and family at a traditional ceremony, groom Luke wants to get married on the party island of Ibiza, where the couple first met

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: President of Moes Southwest Grill, Paul Damico, goes undercover to check the standards he values are still being met. The company is one of the worlds fastest growing restaurant chains with 10,000 employees and Paul wants to look for opportunities to assist his staff in a similar way to how his family were helped by his fathers bosses during his childhood

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: The second dinner party serves up romantic confessions for some, but one bride struggles to find the support and validation shes looking for from her husband, leaving her questioning her marriage

He thinks the world still has time to prepare for the worst, but the crisis happens almost immediately - and as storms, earthquakes and hurricanes strike in terrifying fashion, he races across America to rescue his son from a frozen New York. Disaster thriller, with Jake Gyllenhaal and Dennis Quaid

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK

As the lights are dimmed, it remains to be seen whether Nicolles insecurities will re-emerge. Meanwhile, engaged couple Katey and Dan plan a night of sexual fun with residents Josh and Holly

With the time now served, he has returned, but must first regain his brothers trust before he can save their business

programme.desc: Jay worries his eventual death will allow Gloria to remarry, and decides to buy them both a crypt, ensuring they will be together for eternity. programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

Howard and Bernadette fall out over plans to renovate his childhood home. Wil Wheaton, Adam Nimoy and Stephen Merchant guest star

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer manages to become the owner of the power plant and, in a rare display of intelligence and ingenuity, he celebrates his new-found prestige by sacking former boss Mr Burns - who does not take kindly to being ousted

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Scuse Me While I Miss the Sky

programme.desc: Tensions rise in Graces family, and a row erupts between sisters. Tom and Peri rekindle their teenage romance. And a resident plots revenge

programme.desc: A look back at a classic episode of Hollyoaks ahead of the soaps 30th anniversary. The jubilant McQueens board the wedding party train, oblivious to the danger ahead. Meanwhile, Maxine plots her escape, putting her faith in Sienna and unaware that disaster is about to strike

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Luca, a 31-year-old tiler from Essex, is hoping to polish up his love life by visiting the First Dates restaurant, and is keen to prove hes not the player women judge him to be. His date is TV presenter Hayley, who may be confident on camera, but finds dating rather daunting. Next in is 72-year-old retired prison officer Sandie who, having modelled the first police-issue trousers for women, completed a Masters, and written a book, has lived a full life and wants to find someone to share an active retirement with. Her date is 79-year-old tennis coach Chris, who is also on the lookout for someone fit and active

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK

Alice and Sam Vanderpump have some big news to break to their friends

programme.title: Open House: The Great Sex Experiment
programme.desc: The bold social experiment exploring whether relationships can thrive without monogamy returns. Married couple Chloe and Paul from Liverpool are childhood sweethearts whove never had sex with anyone except each other. Now they want to see if an open relationship can allow Chloe to explore whether she might also be attracted to women. Mark and Tanith from Yorkshire want to find out if having sex with other people can help build trust, which has been under threat due to Marks past cheating

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: The experiment hits the next phase, as friends and family visit the couples for in-laws week, providing a breakthrough for one couple in need of intervention

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Livvy seems intent on moving on as she goes on her first date with Kit, and Jack asks Jules flatmate Maddison on a date. Arman has got both Tabitha and Yas back on side, but the DJ seems to be playing a dangerous game. Meanwhile, Jazz confides in Jules and Jack that Demi has said she doesnt trust her. Alice and Sam Vanderpump have some big news to break to their friends

programme.title: Below Deck
programme.desc: A picky guest tests chef Nicks patience in the final charter of the season. The couples on board make plans to see if their romances will survive in the real world. The deck team start to slip, and there are serious consequences when bosun Ben challenges Captain Kerry

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa begins a whirlwind romance with her intellectual match, much to Marges chagrin. Meanwhile, Bart and Milhouse take inspiration from their favourite TV show and set out to debunk Springfield Elementarys most famous legends. With the voices of Jamie Hyneman and Adam Savage (hosts of Mythbusters) and Michael Cera (Scott Pilgrim vs the World)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge signs Homer and Bart up on a father-son bonding ocean voyage in a bid to heal their troubled relationship, and while the pair are away takes over Homers fantasy football league. Animation, featuring the voice of Nick Offerman (Parks and Recreation)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When Leonard and Sheldon are invited to speak at UC Berkeley, they decide to take a detour and try to meet one of their idols - Star Wars director George Lucas. Meanwhile, Raj and Amy offer to settle a dispute with a game of table tennis. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy has a date with a mystery man, so Sheldon asks Howard and Raj to help him find a new girlfriend online. When Amy is coy with the details about the guy shes dating, Penny and Bernadette decide to spy on them. Stephen Merchant guest stars

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy try hanging out as friends when they spend Thanksgiving together at the aquarium. Howard reluctantly agrees to volunteer at a soup kitchen with Bernadette, Raj and Emily. Meanwhile, Penny discovers that Leonard knows more about her than she thought

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: On the trail of an historic achievement made at the dawn of the Edwardian era, Michael Portillo investigates the first radio signal to be sent across the Atlantic. Then, in Plymouth, he uncovers what happened to surviving crew members of the most famous ocean liner in history, the Titanic. Later, at Fowey, the former politician rediscovers a lost literary figure known as Q, who immortalised the town in his novels

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels from Pontyclun to Ebbw Vale in Wales. Along the way, he visits the Royal Mint in Llantrisant and Cardiff Arms Park, scene of the first Welsh victory over the All Blacks back in 1905. In Cardiff Bay, Michael discovers the departure point for one of the Edwardian eras most famous expeditions - Scotts ill-fated voyage to the Antarctic

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels to the steel city of Sheffield where he discovers an early 20th century steam engine which produced armour plates for a Royal Navy warship. Then, Michael heads south into Nottinghamshire and to the former pit village of Eastwood, before arriving in Nantwich, where he takes a dip in the briny

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo enjoys a ukulele lesson in Haddington, East Lothian, birthplace of the Victorian self-improvement guru Samuel Smiles. In Musselburgh, he gets a taste of life as a fishwife, before exploring Edinburgh where a popular 19th-century mode of transport is making a comeback. Michael also visits the Royal College of Surgeons, where he discovers the macabre history of body snatchers and murderers and heads onwards to the University of Edinburgh Medical School, to learn how students use sophisticated technology to study anatomy

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on train journeys through Edwardian Britain, exploring the grand estates of Norfolk and a bivouac on Brownsea Island on the way. He also learns the ropes aboard an Edwardian wherry on the Norfolk Broads

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo heads to Chichester, West Sussex, where he encounters an Edwardian motoring duo patronised by King Edward VII. After a grand tour of their factory, he is treated to some rest and relaxation in one of their finest vehicles. Arriving in the resort of Southsea, Hampshire, Michael heads for the Kings Theatre, where he treads the boards in a community production of Lads in the Village. Crossing the Solent, the presenter boards the Island Line to travel along the pier in a 1930s London Underground carriage, then hops on to the Isle of Wight heritage line bound for Wootton

programme.title: Muppets from Space
programme.desc: Gonzo hits the road with pal Rizzo in tow and goes in search of his roots - only to make the amazing discovery that his parents belonged to a race of aliens. He then has to choose whether to board a UFO and return to his family, or stay with the friends he knows and loves. Family comedy, with F Murray Abraham, David Arquette, Ray Liotta, Andie MacDowell and Rob Schneider alongside the puppets

programme.title: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
programme.desc: A teenager discovers he is the last in a long line of warriors destined to defend the world from dark forces. His duty now is to embark on a perilous journey through time to recover the six parts of a powerful mystical artefact and ensure it is returned to safe hands. Fantasy adventure, starring Alexander Ludwig, Christopher Eccleston and Ian McShane

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: After being bitten by a radioactive arachnid, student Miles Morales develops incredible abilities, and becomes a version of Spider-Man. When a super collider device opens a gateway to other dimensions, Miles crosses paths with five counterparts to stop a threat for all realities. Oscar-winning animated adventure, with the voices of Shameik Moore and Nicolas Cage

programme.title: Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: A minor-league ice hockey player is nicknamed the Tooth Fairy for knocking opponents teeth out on the ice. When the cynical athlete discourages a young fan, he is forced to pay penance by spending a week as the real Tooth Fairy, rediscovering his dreams in the process. Family comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Ashley Judd, Stephen Merchant, Ryan Sheckler and Seth MacFarlane

programme.title: Dog
programme.desc: US Army Ranger Briggs is determined to regain his place at Joint Base Lewis-McChord in Washington. His superior officer agrees to return him to the fold if he can successfully escort a military working dog named Lulu along Americas Pacific Coast to attend the funeral of her handler. Comedy, co-directed by and starring Channing Tatum

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: The daughter of retired special forces officer John Matrix is kidnapped by an old comrade-in-arms, now in league with a deposed former dictator. The tyrant plans to use the girl to force Matrix into assassinating the head of the country he once ruled, but is unprepared for the lengths to which the veteran soldier will go to rescue his child. Action adventure, with Arnold Schwarzenegger and Rae Dawn Chong

programme.title: American Woman
programme.desc: In a small blue-collar town in Pennsylvania lives Debra Callahan, a 32-year-old womans whose teenage daughter Bridget goes missing. Left to raise her infant grandson alone, Debra seeks the answers behind Bridgets disappearance. Director Jake Scotts drama, starring Sienna Miller, Christina Hendricks, Sky Ferreira and Kentucker Audley

programme.title: You Are Not My Mother
programme.desc: A Dublin teenagers mother goes missing, and she starts to wonder whether her erratic behaviour may be caused by something more sinister than a psychiatric condition. Psychological horror, starring Hazel Doupe and Carolyn Bracken

programme.title: The Desert Fox
programme.desc: German commander Rommel falls out of favour with Hitler following his defeat at El Alamein. On returning to his homeland, he is torn between his oath of loyalty and lack of faith in the Fuehrers unstable leadership, prompting him to become involved in an assassination plot. Second World War drama, starring James Mason, Jessica Tandy, Cedric Hardwicke, Leo G Carroll and Luther Adler

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: In 1920s Paris, exiled Russians claim they have found the daughter of the last Tsar, who was originally believed to have been killed with the rest of her family. She is taken into the care of a General and groomed until she can convince Anastasias cousin Prince Paul that she is genuinely the tsarina and inherit a fortune. Historical drama, starring an Oscar-winning Ingrid Bergman, and Yul Brynner

programme.title: Pool of London
programme.desc: A sailor learns his involvement in smuggling has made him the chief suspect in a murder case, and reluctantly goes on the run. Ealing thriller, starring Bonar Colleano, Susan Shaw, Renee Asherson and James Robertson Justice

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: A cavalry officer has to avoid showing preferential treatment when the son he has not seen for 15 years is posted to his fort as a cadet. His estranged wife also turns up wanting to take the boy away, but he is forced to put duty before his family when called on to rescue children kidnapped by Apaches on the Mexican border. John Fords Western, with John Wayne, Maureen OHara, Ben Johnson and J Carrol Naish

programme.title: Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: The crew and passengers of a cargo plane are left stranded in the Gobi desert after a crash. They embark on a desperate plan to return to civilisation - by building a new plane out of the wreckage of the old one. Action adventure remake, starring Dennis Quaid, Tyrese Gibson, Giovanni Ribisi, Miranda Otto and Hugh Laurie

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick
programme.desc: Pete Maverick Mitchell returns to the Top Gun Instructor programme, where he must confront his past as he trains a group of younger pilots for a deadly mission. Among them is the son of Mavericks deceased best friend, Lieutenant Nick Goose Bradshaw. Director Joseph Kosinskis Oscar-winning action drama, starring Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller, Val Kilmer, Bashir Salahuddin and Glen Powell

programme.title: Io Capitano
programme.desc: Two young boys, Seydou and Moussa, leave Dakar to reach Europe for a better life. Drama, starring Seydou Sarr and Moustapha Fall. In Wolof, French, Arabic and Italian with English subtitles

programme.title: The Guard
programme.desc: A laidback Irish policeman has a sharp mind for detective work, but a less than dedicated attitude to enforcing the law. His simple life is disrupted when he is forced to work with an uptight FBI agent in pursuit of an international drug-smuggling operation. Comedy thriller, with Brendan Gleeson, Don Cheadle and Mark Strong

programme.title: Midsomer Murders

Founded by the Saint-Stephens family in memory of their late daughter, the event attracts all manner of mediums, psychics and followers of the occult. When a body is found surrounded by ritual symbols on the eve of the gathering, Barnaby must step into a world of self-proclaimed witches to find the killer. Crime drama, starring Neil Dudgeon, with Tracy-Ann Oberman and Colin Salmon

programme.title: Doc Martin

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: A body is found buried on the Northumberland moors which could be a missing teenager from the nearby rural community of Brindale. The girl had disappeared six weeks previously, and Vera has to break the news to her devastated family. However, the realisation that she died so close to home rather than at a music festival as originally thought creates tension among her neighbours, who are soon suspecting each other of murder. The detective delves into the vulnerable young womans isolated existence to identify her killer

programme.title: Coldwater
programme.desc: Tensions rise as John and Fiona attend the funeral of a beloved local resident, before hosting old friends from London. Tommy and Rebecca are thrown into a panic when they discover their son Cameron has gone missing. John and Fiona attempt to maintain the appearance of a contented life in front of their friends, but old wounds resurface and its not long before Tommy shows up to their dinner unannounced. Thriller, starring Andrew Lincoln, Indira Varma, Ewen Bremner and Eve Myles

programme.title: Coldwater

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The heroes in a half shell come to terms with their new roles as saviours of New York City in an animated series set shortly after the events chronicled in the film Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem. Donatello (voiced by Micah Abbey), Leonardo (Nicolas Cantu), Michelangelo (Shamon Brown Jr) and Raphael (Brady Noon) experience the usual growing pains of teenagers while contending with the media spotlight. Building on their friendship with aspiring reporter April ONeil (Ayo Edebiri), the reptilian quartet face brilliant inventor Bishop (Alanna Ubach), who believes mutants are the greatest danger facing humankind and must be eliminated. Meanwhile, pampered rich kid Rod (Pete Davison) yearns to be a mutant and leverages his wealth and connections to achieve a dangerous dream

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: The wise-cracking blue hedgehog, made famous by a series of popular video games on Sega consoles, continues his computer-animated adventures through the Shatterverse. At the end of the first series, the eponymous spiny mammal (voiced by Deven Mack) learnt from black hedgehog Shadow (Ian Hanlin) that the original version of Green Hill no longer exists. Sonic is trapped in a multiverse of mayhem with different iterations of his friends Amy Rose (Shannon Chan-Kent), Knuckles (Adam Nurada), Rouge (Kazumi Evans) and Tails (Ashleigh Ball). Sonic and Shadow must put aside their differences and work together to repair the temporal damage and outwit diabolical scientist Dr Eggman (Brian Drummond)

Travelling to the small town in Northern Ireland where her father grew up, her understanding of her grandparents - who suffered a heartbreaking family tragedy - is turned on its head. On her mothers side, Anna starts with her grandfather Maxwell, whose name she added to her own to create her stage name. programme.desc: Kika is a golden labrador and guide dog for her owner Dr Amit, who is blind, which means he cannot see. She is trained to use her supersight to help Dr Amit do as many things as he can by himself. Together, they make the best team! Dr Amit is helping Raj the grocer judge the carrots in the fruit and veg competition at the Woofton country fair. Kika is helping Dr Amit, including with the mouthwatering task of finding the tastiest carrot in Woofton! But when Amit has to bring the prize-winning carrots to the photographer from the Woofton Gazette, Kika must guide Amit safely back through the maze of stalls, visitors and obstacles while carrying a precious carrot cargo.

programme.title: 10 Things to Know About
programme.desc: Aoibhinn Ní Shúilleabháin, Kathriona Devereux and Jonathan McCrea examine research into mental health, meeting people collaborating to improve access to services for adolescents in rural and marginalised communities. They also hear from Irish scientist studying zebrafish to explore whether the microbiome can affect hormones like oxytocin, and identify mechanisms that could lead to better understanding and management of illnesses

programme.title: Casualty
programme.desc: A plane crashes at Holby, and with Dylan unavailable, Stevie is placed in charge of the ED. Siobhan is stunned when Rich is brought in from the site of the disaster. Faith catches Astrid trying to steal drugs from the supply cupboard using her pass, Kareem discharges himself, and Jan delivers good and bad news to Jacob

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc: After a mysterious thief keeps stealing valuable treasures from under his nose, Hercule Flambeau visits Kembleford to see if Father Brown can help him to eliminate the competition. Mark Williams and John Light star in the crime drama

programme.title: Foram
programme.desc: Caoimhe Ní Laighin hosts current affairs debate on national and international stories, with reports from Darragh Ó Caoimh

programme.title: Service
programme.desc: An evangelical service from RTÉ studios, with music and prayer from Crown Jesus Ministries. Led by Olga Mullarkey with a Bible teaching from Mitch

programme.title: The Week in Politics
programme.desc: Reflections on the political week, including contributions from journalists, senators and TDs. Hosted by Áine Lawlor

programme.title: RTÉ News: One OClock and Weather
Nevens Ulster Food Tour
programme.desc: Neven Maguire visits Baronscourt Estate in Omagh, County Tyrone, a leading supplier of high-quality venison, and explores the estates approach to deer management and sustainable game meat production. In Derry, he checks into the Bishops Gate Hotel, learning about its history, and some of the notable people who have stayed there. Back home, Neven cooks crusted venison with creamed Cabbage, blackberry jus, and baby carrots

programme.title: Seisiún
programme.desc: This edition takes viewers to the infamous DeBarras in Clonakilty - a family run music hub welcoming music lovers for over 50 years. Featuring stories about how Noel Redding, the base player from the Jimmy Hendrix experience, came to hold court at the folk club, attracting national and international talent who helped change the cultural and music character of the town itself

programme.title: Tracks and Trails
programme.desc: Director of Science for Society, Dr Ruth Freeman starts her visit to Kilkenny with a 10 kilometre stroll, which meanders along The River Nore from the city of Kilkenny to Bennetsbridge. For her second walk she begins in Graiguenamanagh, which sits on the River Barrow

programme.title: Nerves of Steel
programme.desc: This full access behind-the-scenes series follows the trials and tribulations of building Europes longest intertwining family and thrillcoasters

programme.title: All Creatures Great and Small
programme.desc: When new vet Richard Carmody joins the practice, James feels his place by Siegfrieds side is threatened. Conflicts come to the surface at Mrs Pumphreys community tea party. Drama, starring Nicholas Ralph

programme.title: The Money List
programme.desc: Champions Yvonne from Kildare and Cathal from Cork take on Anu from Dublin and Elizabeth from Cork. The winners face off against new challengers from Dylan from Wexford and Monica from Cork. Hosted by Baz Ashmawy

programme.desc: Sally admits she put a tracker in Sams bag, much to Cons fury - theyre supposed to be encouraging him to be independent. programme.desc: A look at the life and career of the actor, who starred in The Graduate, Midnight Cowboy and Tootsie and won Academy Awards for his roles in Kramer vs Kramer and Rain Man

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: When a driver picks up a hitch-hiker in his car, his mundane journey turns into a thrilling ride involving cunning trickery. Drama, starring Rod Taylor and Cyril Cusack

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: An Austrian couple rejoice when, following a difficult pregnancy, they finally bring their son into the world - but their celebrations may be premature

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A very rude traveling salesman forces a truck off the road, causing a delay in emergency care for an injured young man

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: Mr Laffler invites Mr Costain to join him for dinner at a private club that he says will be a very special experience

programme.title: Andre Rieu
programme.desc: Performances from South Africa, Germany and Mexico, with the violinist presenting tunes including Mexican Hat Dance, Hava Nagila, La Paloma and Cielito Lindo

programme.title: Les Miserables - The Staged Concert
programme.desc: A stage recording of the musical based on Victor Hugos novel, filmed at the Gielgud Theatre in Londons West End in December 2019 and starring Michael Ball, Alfie Boe, Carrie Hope Fletcher and Matt Lucas

programme.title: Nigel Kennedy: The Four Seasons
programme.desc: The violinist performs Vivaldis work with the English Chamber Orchestra, a piece that earned him a place in the record books as the best-selling classical work of all time

programme.title: Arts Most
programme.desc: Waldemar Januszczak confronts terrifying artistic displays of blood, gore and death, and wonders why art is so obsessed with horror

programme.title: Van Gogh by Vincent
programme.desc: Dutch painter Vincent van Goghs name and likeness is known around the world. This documentary tells his story through his self-portraits, drawing on contributions from art historians and readings from his private letters

programme.title: Inside Art
programme.sub-title: Inside Art: Lubaina Himid at Tate Modern
programme.desc: Kate Bryan visits the studio of the influential artist Lubaina Himid, winner of the 2017 Turner Prize, before exploring her new large-scale exhibition at Tate Modern

programme.title: Inside Art
programme.sub-title: Inside Art: Picasso/Ingres at the National Gallery
programme.desc: A look at two portraits side by side for the first time in the shape of Pablo Picassos Woman with a Book and Madame Moitessier by Jean-Auguste-Dominique Ingres

programme.title: The Art of the Garden
programme.sub-title: Jo Thompson, Cool Garden, RHS Rosemoor
programme.desc: Jo Thompsons design for RHS Garden Rosemoor in Devon, where she used all of her skills to show how water can be turned from an issue into an opportunity

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: Richard E Grant travels to Venice, said to be the city with the highest concentration of luxury hotels on the planet. He discovers how a measuring error led to the building of the citys biggest swimming pool, tries out a 15,000 euro-a-night royal suite whose bed has been slept in by everyone from the Beckhams to Prince Charles and the Duchess of Cornwall, and visits a hotel that keeps its doors open even when water floods to knee height. He also finds out why breaking a window once earned Ernest Hemingway a 10 per cent discount on his room

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming examines the hidden histories of cities, revealing the sights and sounds rarely witnessed by the public. He begins in London at St Pauls Cathedral, where he visits a place tourists never go, before exploring a hidden park and a little-known church. He also gets a guided tour of Soho from broadcaster Danny Baker

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: Given three weeks to work the case, Perry and Della try to build a defence for their clients, while Paul chases leads in Hooverville

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: Pauls shocking discovery brings the brothers testimony into question, while Perry pursues a plea deal and Della continues her search for answers

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: Perry attempts to negotiate with the DA as the Gallardos trial nears, while Rafael and Mateo recount the real-life consequences of the McCutcheons Los Angeles expansion. The pursuit of a lead lands Paul in danger and Perry makes a convincing demonstration.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: Perry receives important information from Holcomb, while Della interrogates Councilman Taylor and - armed with incriminating evidence - tries to change the course of the case

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: Faced with career-ending accusations and potential jail time, Perry must turn to Strickland to stay ahead of the prosecution. Della presses Hamilton for answers and Paul enlists Clara to infiltrate a wealthy white suburb

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: As their final day in court nears, Mateo and Rafael prepare for the worst, while Perry, Della, and Paul work with an unlikely ally to sway the prosecutions hand. Then, after making his closing arguments, Perry faces the consequences of his relentless pursuit of justice

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The Hound is judged by the gods, while Jaime receives a different form of justice at the hands of men. Robb is betrayed, Jon proves himself and Tyrion learns the true cost of a wedding. Fantasy drama, starring Richard Madden, Kit Harington and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Lord Tywin plans strategic unions for the Lannisters, Melisandre visits the Riverlands and Robb weighs up a compromise to repair his alliance with House Frey. Roose Bolton decides what to do with Jaime, while Jon, Ygritte and the wildlings face a daunting climb. Fantasy drama, starring Charles Dance

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Sansa frets about her prospects, Tyrions new situation agitates Shae, and Tywin counsels the king. Daenerys exchanges gifts with a slave lord outside Yunkai, Melisandre reveals a secret to Robert Baratheons illegitimate son Gendry, and Brienne faces a formidable foe at Harrenhal. Emilia Clarke and Peter Dinklage star in an episode written by George RR Martin, whose novels form the basis for the series

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Daenerys and her entourage discover Yunkais powerful friends are the Second Sons, an elite army of mercenaries. Determined to take the city and increase the strength of her own forces, the queen agrees to meet the sellsword companys captains - intending to make them a better offer. Meanwhile, Davos is still desperate to make Stannis see clearly and demands to see proof of Melisandres power. There is a wedding in Kings Landing, and beyond the Wall, Sam and Gilly have a chilling encounter with a foe that seems to have come straight from their nightmares. Fantasy drama, starring Emilia Clarke and Liam Cunningham

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Robb and his bannermen gather at the Twins in the northern Riverlands to attend the wedding of Lord Edmure Tully and Roslin Frey, daughter of Lord Walder. Elsewhere, Jon faces his harshest test to date, Daario and Ser Jorah debate how to take Yunkai, and Bran discovers a new gift. Fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire novels, starring Richard Madden, Michelle Fairley and David Bradley

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The various warring factions of Westeros receive news of the events of the wedding at the Twins. In Kings Landing, Joffrey stands up to his grandfather Tywin, Daenerys discovers whether shell be remembered as a conqueror or a liberator in Yunkai, and mercy comes from a surprising source in Dragonstone. Fantasy drama, starring Emilia Clarke, Charles Dance and Jack Gleeson

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: In the midst of preparing for a key operation, Tom questions the loyalty of the members of his task force, while Robbie and Cliff plan for their meeting at the park. Perry searches for answers within the gang and uncovers a shocking truth and Maeve casts doubt on Robbies exit plan

programme.title: True Detective
programme.desc: The third series of Nic Pizzolattos crime anthology continues. Wayne finds himself in a no-win situation as new clues emerge in the Purcell case

programme.title: The Wire
programme.desc: McNulty and Daniels debate how to protect a key witness in the months before he testifies. Meanwhile, Sydnor and Carver track down the Barksdale crews main stash house, and Prez demonstrates his talent for following the paper trail. Proposition Joe brokers a meeting between Omar and Stringer, while an undercover operation has terrible consequences for one of the unit

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Sophies therapy session takes an interesting direction when her mother decides to join her. Drama, starring Gabriel Byrne

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: Five years after the events in Salt Lake City, a now 19-year-old Ellie makes a discovery while on patrol with her best friend Dina. Back in Jackson Hole, Joel seeks help to mend his relationship with Ellie. The return of the post-apocalyptic drama, starring Pedro Pascal and Bella Ramsey

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: Tom and his team inch closer to breaking the case with help from an eyewitness, while Perry pays Maeve a visit and Robbie puts his plan in motion. Later, Tom follows a lead that takes him down a dangerous path

programme.title: Succession

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Jake becomes emotional during his session, and Amy makes a decision that will change the direction of her life

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: The Penningtons, owners of Muncaster Castle in the Lake District, discuss the challenges of housing three generations of their family under one roof, while elderly patriarch Patrick struggles to find new purpose following the death of his wife. At Maunsel House in Somerset, Sir Benjamin Slades preconceptions are challenged when a gay mens choir arrives for a weekend break

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: Lord and Lady Fitzalan Howard try to impress American guests at Carlton Towers with a programme of traditional activities, including skinning rabbits and taking high tea. Meanwhile, Sir Humphry Wakefield entertains tourists on a wine-tasting weekend at Chillingham Castle

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming visits Liverpool, cutting through cliches about football and the Beatles to explore its less-celebrated treasures. Among his destinations are a 1930s banking building that has remained unaltered since closing in 2007, a well-appointed set of toilets and a recording studio hidden in a bar. He also discovers which former dictator once spent Christmas in the city

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky hosts a New Years Eve party to see in 1923, but makes an enemy of whiskey-loving gangster Gyp Rosetti - while cracks begin to appear in his marriage after Margaret makes a major decision. Van Alden heads for Illinois as he tries to escape the clutches of the FBI, and Al Capone is infuriated by an Irish mobster. Drama set in Prohibition-era Atlantic City, starring Steve Buscemi, Kelly Macdonald and Stephen Graham, with Bobby Cannavale (Nurse Jackie)

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Eli is released from prison and returns to Atlantic City, but discovers much has changed during his time inside - including his status within Nuckys organisation. Gyp Rosetti decides to make his mark on the liquor trade, Margaret tries to deal with what she saw at the hospital, and Chalky thinks his daughter Maybelle may have found a suitable husband. Meanwhile, Nucky tries to investigate some of his political rivals

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: Faced with career-ending accusations and potential jail time, Perry must turn to Strickland to stay ahead of the prosecution. Della presses Hamilton for answers and Paul enlists Clara to infiltrate a wealthy white suburb

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: As their final day in court nears, Mateo and Rafael prepare for the worst, while Perry, Della, and Paul work with an unlikely ally to sway the prosecutions hand. Then, after making his closing arguments, Perry faces the consequences of his relentless pursuit of justice

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The Laws of Gods and Men
programme.desc: Stannis and Davos arrive in Braavos for their meeting with the Iron Bank, but find Tycho Nestoris (Mark Gatiss) a hard man to do business with. Yara Greyjoy leads a band of Ironborn on a mission to rescue her brother Theon, while Daenerys meets with supplicants in Meereen. In Kings Landing, Tyrions trial begins in the throne room and he is stunned by the identity of one of the crowns witnesses. Fantasy drama, starring Stephen Dillane and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: My Brilliant Friend
programme.desc: Elena grows tired of Gino, while Lila rejects two potential suitors at a cost. Elsewhere, a rare outing into the city turns violent. In Italian

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky carries on his search for Billie, but receives an unwanted distraction when the church decides to honour him. He also faces continuing pressure from Gyp Rosetti, who is impatiently trying to make inroads into the Atlantic City liquor trade. Margaret refuses to abandon her quest to improve the treatment of female patients at the hospital, while Van Alden struggles to adjust to his new life in Chicago

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nuckys well-oiled operation is thrown into jeopardy by the death of Sheriff Victor Sickles, and his worries are only compounded when he is forced into hiding while trying to track down a precocious liquor thief. Meanwhile, Al Capone discovers his deaf son is being bullied at school, Lucky haggles with notorious New York gangster Joe Masseria, and Margaret promotes Dr Masons new womens clinic. Prohibition-era drama, starring Steve Buscemi

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Kellerman and Lewis hit a wall of silence when investigating a murder at a housing project after a previous case caused the black community to distrust the police

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: The murderer of a well-known attorney presents himself to Pembleton and Bayliss. Police drama, starring Kyle Secor and Andre Braugher

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Arya continues her training at the House of Black and White, Jorah and Tyrion run into slavers and the Sand Snakes mount an attack. Fantasy, starring Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Jon prepares for conflict, Sansa tries to talk to Theon, and Brienne waits for a sign. Elsewhere, Jaime attempts to reconnect with his family

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: Tom and his team inch closer to breaking the case with help from an eyewitness, while Perry pays Maeve a visit and Robbie puts his plan in motion. Later, Tom follows a lead that takes him down a dangerous path
