programme.desc: Mare opens up about her familys history with mental health. Later, she meets with a semi-retired source about possible connections in her three cases

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: A nasty remark about his wife sets a livid Johnny on a personal vendetta, Meadow considers volunteer work at a law centre and Furio throws a big house-warming party. Meanwhile, Tony and Carmela fall out over money and a veteran hitman receives an offer from Silvio and Christopher

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: Hoods preparations for a hit on an armoured truck transporting funds from the local casino are interrupted by a gang of troublemaking bikers. They make their presence known by attacking Carrie and hospitalising Sugar, but are upset when one of the gang is shot dead by Siobhan as a result. Bent on revenge, they wreak havoc at Banshees annual Spirit Festival before turning their attentions to the deputy

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Arya makes progress in her training, Sansa confronts an old friend, Cersei faces a struggle and Jon embarks on a journey. Fantasy drama, starring Lena Headey

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Westeros, Jon returns to the Wall from his controversial ranging mission, and Stannis faces a difficult decision. Meanwhile, in Braavos, Arya runs into a familiar face and Mace Tyrell visits the Iron Bank, and against her better judgement Daenerys hosts a traditional Meereenese celebration of athleticism. Fantasy drama, starring Kit Harington, Stephen Dillane, Maisie Williams and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Life in the Devon fishing port of Brixham. Spring is in the air, and the town is a hive of activity as skippers return their pleasure yachts to the water after winter in the dry dock, while the pressure is on for Brixham to look its best for the arrival of Princess Anne, who will officially open the new £20million fish market, and the start of the summer season

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Alex recounts one of his most recent dreams, and Paul attempts to work out its hidden meaning. Gabriel Byrne and Blair Underwood star

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Brixham hosts its annual Pirate Festival, paying tribute to Devons colourful maritime history, while fisherman Nathan sets off in search of a lucrative catch

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: A youngster called Chan Lok-kwan accidentally enters the Walled City, discovers the order amidst its chaos, and learns important life lessons along the way. Chinese crime thriller with subtitles, starring Raymond Lam, Louis Koo and Sammo Hung

programme.title: American Night
programme.desc: Art and life collide as John Kaplan, a courier carrying Andy Warhols famous Pink Marilyn, arrives in New York City. Kaplan attempts to juggle the Mob and his talent as an art forger with his complicated love life. Crime drama, starring Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Emile Hirsch, Paz Vega and Jeremy Piven

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: An FBI agent is assigned to protect a witness in the trial of a feared crime boss. However, when they board their flight from Hawaii to Los Angeles, the gangsters henchmen set in motion their plan to smuggle onto the aircraft and then release 450 poisonous snakes. Thriller, starring Samuel L Jackson, Julianna Margulies and Jonathan Phillips

programme.title: Twisters
programme.desc: Meteorologist Kate Cooper crosses paths with social media star Tyler Owens. He recklessly chases storms with his crew and gleefully posts their daredevil exploits, as multiple storm systems converge over central Oklahoma. Standalone disaster sequel, starring Daisy Edgar-Jones and Glen Powell

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: A drifter in a post-apocalyptic wasteland encounters a crazed, sadistic warlord and his radiation-afflicted cult. He assists a warrior who has turned against the tyrant, and liberates five women who have been forced to become his brides. Together, they make a desperate journey through the desert to salvation, with their enemies in hot pursuit. Reboot of the sci-fi thriller franchise, starring Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A former army sniper is arrested following a random shooting that leaves five people dead, but protests his innocence. An elusive former military police investigator is called in to examine the case, and becomes convinced a conspiracy is at work. Action thriller based on Lee Childs novel One Shot, starring Tom Cruise, Rosamund Pike, Werner Herzog and Robert Duvall

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: The nomadic vigilante tries to save an army major who has been framed for murder and treason. Jack Reacher discovers that Turner has been targeted by a secret government conspiracy, and together they go on the run to expose the truth. Director Edward Zwicks blockbusting action thriller sequel based on Lee Childs novel, starring Tom Cruise, Cobie Smulders, Danika Yarosh and Aldis Hodge

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: An assassin faces a race against time when he learns a rival has poisoned him with a drug that will kill him if his heart rate drops below a certain level. As he sets out to take revenge on his enemies, he has to resort to increasingly desperate acts to keep his adrenaline pumping. Action thriller, with Jason Statham, Amy Smart and Jose Pablo Cantillo

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: A youngster called Chan Lok-kwan accidentally enters the Walled City, discovers the order amidst its chaos, and learns important life lessons along the way. Chinese crime thriller with subtitles, starring Raymond Lam, Louis Koo and Sammo Hung

programme.title: American Night
programme.desc: Art and life collide as John Kaplan, a courier carrying Andy Warhols famous Pink Marilyn, arrives in New York City. Kaplan attempts to juggle the Mob and his talent as an art forger with his complicated love life. Crime drama, starring Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Emile Hirsch, Paz Vega and Jeremy Piven

programme.title: Seeking Justice
programme.desc: A man whose wife has been attacked is approached by a member of a vigilante group who offers to deal with the perpetrator. He accepts the offer and is told he will have to return the favour - but when the time comes to pay up, he discovers he is required to kill someone. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, January Jones and Guy Pearce

programme.title: One More Shot
programme.desc: A Navy SEAL squad leader escorts a suspected terrorist from a black site when they come under fire from a group of mercenaries. Director James Nunns thriller, starring Scott Adkins, Alexis Knapp and Tom Berenger

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A former army sniper is arrested following a random shooting that leaves five people dead, but protests his innocence. An elusive former military police investigator is called in to examine the case, and becomes convinced a conspiracy is at work. Action thriller based on Lee Childs novel One Shot, starring Tom Cruise, Rosamund Pike, Werner Herzog and Robert Duvall

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: The nomadic vigilante tries to save an army major who has been framed for murder and treason. Jack Reacher discovers that Turner has been targeted by a secret government conspiracy, and together they go on the run to expose the truth. Director Edward Zwicks blockbusting action thriller sequel based on Lee Childs novel, starring Tom Cruise, Cobie Smulders, Danika Yarosh and Aldis Hodge

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A powerful crime kingpin hosts a martial arts tournament on his island lair. A former Shaolin monk is recruited by an intelligence agency to enter the tournament and expose the crime lords opium and slavery rings. He finds himself fighting for his life alongside two Vietnam veterans who are both fleeing their own enemies. Thriller, starring Bruce Lee, John Saxon, Jim Kelly and Kien Shih

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: A wealthy playboy inherits a media empire when his father dies. Determined to do some good for a change, he uses his new-found fortune to become a masked crime-fighter. Aided by his chauffeur, who is a kung fu expert and a technical genius, he fights to bring down a powerful gangster. Comic-book adventure, starring Seth Rogen, Jay Chou, Cameron Diaz and Christoph Waltz

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: When three different animals become infected with a dangerous pathogen, a primatologist and a geneticist team up to stop them from destroying Chicago. Fantasy adventure, starring Dwayne Johnson, Naomie Harris and Malin Akerman

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: A Trojan prince elopes with the king of Spartas wife, sparking a bitter and bloody war between a mighty alliance of Greek kings and the city of Troy, whose champion engages in intense personal conflict with the enemys most formidable warrior. Wolfgang Petersens adventure, inspired by Homers epic poem The Iliad, with Brad Pitt, Eric Bana, Orlando Bloom, Brian Cox, Sean Bean and Peter OToole

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: With the imminent destruction of their home planet approaching, a man and his wife seek to preserve their race by sending their infant son to Earth. The childs spacecraft lands at the farm of Jonathan and Martha Kent, who name him Clark and raise him as their own son. Though his extraordinary abilities have led to the adult Clark living on the fringe of society, he is forced to take a stand to protect his adopted home from a fanatical general from his own world, who intends to wipe out the human race. Sci-fi adventure based on the Superman comic-books, starring Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon and Russell Crowe

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A man living in a bleak future years after a nuclear war has fake memories of being a secret agent implanted into his brain. However, the procedure uncovers the fact that he really is a spy with his memory erased, and he is forced to become a fugitive from the totalitarian government. Sci-fi thriller remake, with Colin Farrell, Kate Beckinsale and Jessica Biel

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: A gladiator in the ancient Roman city falls in love with the daughter of a wealthy merchant, who is being forced into marriage with a corrupt senator. When the nearby volcano Vesuvius erupts, he fights to save her and escape the destruction of the city. Disaster movie, starring Kit Harington, Emily Browning, Carrie-Anne Moss and Kiefer Sutherland

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Cowboy Up!
programme.desc: The feuding duo wind up in the Wild West where they help save a ranch from the hands of a villain. They also try to help a cowgirl and her brother save their homestead from a greedy land-grabber. Animated adventure, with the voices of George Ackles and Sean Burgos

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: A gang of streetwise penguins decides to escape from New Yorks Central Park Zoo and return to a life in the wild, but when Marty the zebra and his friends follow suit, they end up stranded in Africa on a jungle island without a clue about how to fend for themselves. Animated comedy, with the voices of Ben Stiller, David Schwimmer, Chris Rock, Jada Pinkett Smith and Sacha Baron Cohen

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula opens a luxury resort for monsters, to provide a refuge from terrified humans. His cosy sanctuary is disrupted when a normal man unwittingly checks in, and the situation is complicated when the unwanted guest takes a liking to the counts daughter. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Diabolical nemesis Maxime Le Mal and his femme fatale girlfriend Valentina target Anti-Villain League agent Gru, girlfriend Lucy, their girls Margo, Edith and Agnes and new addition Gru Jr. The family goes on the run while the Minions invade AVL HQ. Animated sequel, with the voices of Steve Carell and Will Ferrell

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A youngster believes his baby brother is actually a power-hungry tycoon sent to destroy his perfect family life. However, the duo must put aside their differences and work together when they uncover a plot to sabotage the company their parents work for. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Alec Baldwin, Steve Buscemi, Jimmy Kimmel and Lisa Kudrow

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The escaped zoo animals discover a plane and, following a swift repair job by the penguins, manage to escape the desolate shores of Madagascar. However, they crash-land on the plains of Africa and find themselves face-to-face with their wild counterparts for the first time. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer and Jada Pinkett Smith

programme.title: Smallfoot
programme.desc: A village of Yetis lives on the top of a mountain in the Himalayas, hidden away from sight. An epic journey ensues when one of the clan named Migo stumbles across a real human being - but is banished from his snowy home when no-one believes him. Animated adventure, with the voices of Channing Tatum and James Corden

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Dracula is worried that his half-human grandson is not showing any vampiric tendencies, so enlists the help of his fellow monsters in showing the youngster how it is done. The count is shocked to receive an unwelcome visit from his own father, who does not approve of his sons tolerance of humans. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: A raccoon trickster is fretting about his debt to a fearsome bear when he stumbles on some animals waking in the woods after their winter nap. Spotting the chance to solve his problem, the raccoon dupes the gullible creatures into stealing food from a nearby suburb so he can give it to the bear - but they fail to realise they will soon be at the mercy of a vermin exterminator. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bruce Willis, Steve Carell, Garry Shandling and William Shatner

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A garden snail obsessed with motor racing gets sucked into a cars exhaust pipe, and emerges having gained super-speed. This stroke of luck allows him to realise his dream of competing against human drivers in the prestigious Indianapolis 500 race. Animated adventure, with the voices of Ryan Reynolds, Paul Giamatti and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: Rugrats in Paris
programme.desc: The lucky little tots embark on a trip to a French theme park - but while the rest of the gang are intent on enjoying themselves, Chuckie is distracted by his wish for a new mum. He sets his sights on the owner of the amusement park as a prospective partner for his single dad. Animated adventure, with the voices of Christine Cavanaugh, Elizabeth Daily, Cheryl Chase, Kath Soucie and Susan Sarandon

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: A fun-loving male cow who spends his time hanging out with his friends and partying all night is forced to accept responsibility for the first time in his life, after being placed in charge of the farmyard following the untimely demise of his father. Animated comedy, with the voices of Kevin James, Courteney Cox, Sam Elliott, Danny Glover and Andie MacDowell

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Two Spanish conmen set off for South America on a quest to discover the legendary City of Gold, but soon find themselves in the enviable position of being worshipped as gods by the natives - much to the displeasure of a local priest. Animated musical adventure, with the voices of Kevin Kline, Kenneth Branagh, Rosie Perez, Armand Assante and Edward James Olmos, and featuring a soundtrack by Elton John

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: The animal-loving family heads for Africa, where Eliza discovers unscrupulous poachers are plotting to kill an entire herd of elephants with the aid of a deadly electric fence, leaving her and ever-present pal Darwin to save the day. Animated adventure, with the voices of Lacey Chabert, Tim Curry, Tom Kane, Cree Summer, Lynn Redgrave and Jodi Carlisle

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.desc: Sir Simon de Canterville drowned his wife Lady Eleanor in the lake of Canterville Chase, and for centuries the noblemans ghost has been cursed to haunt the manor. American father Hiram B Otis moves into the country pile with his family, and daughter Virginia forges a pact with Sir Simon to scare her parents back to the States. Animated adventure with the voices of Stephen Fry and Hugh Laurie

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The escaped zoo animals discover a plane and, following a swift repair job by the penguins, manage to escape the desolate shores of Madagascar. However, they crash-land on the plains of Africa and find themselves face-to-face with their wild counterparts for the first time. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer and Jada Pinkett Smith

programme.title: Rugrats in Paris
programme.desc: The lucky little tots embark on a trip to a French theme park - but while the rest of the gang are intent on enjoying themselves, Chuckie is distracted by his wish for a new mum. He sets his sights on the owner of the amusement park as a prospective partner for his single dad. Animated adventure, with the voices of Christine Cavanaugh, Elizabeth Daily, Cheryl Chase, Kath Soucie and Susan Sarandon

programme.title: Smallfoot
programme.desc: A village of Yetis lives on the top of a mountain in the Himalayas, hidden away from sight. An epic journey ensues when one of the clan named Migo stumbles across a real human being - but is banished from his snowy home when no-one believes him. Animated adventure, with the voices of Channing Tatum and James Corden

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Dracula is worried that his half-human grandson is not showing any vampiric tendencies, so enlists the help of his fellow monsters in showing the youngster how it is done. The count is shocked to receive an unwelcome visit from his own father, who does not approve of his sons tolerance of humans. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A garden snail obsessed with motor racing gets sucked into a cars exhaust pipe, and emerges having gained super-speed. This stroke of luck allows him to realise his dream of competing against human drivers in the prestigious Indianapolis 500 race. Animated adventure, with the voices of Ryan Reynolds, Paul Giamatti and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: Rugrats Go Wild
programme.desc: A leaky boat leaves the precocious youngsters stranded on a jungle island, but their luck changes when explorers the Wild Thornberrys come to their rescue. However, Thornberry dad Nigel loses his memory, so it falls to his daughter Eliza to save the day. Childrens animated adventure, with the voices of Nancy Cartwright, Bruce Willis, Lacey Chabert, Elizabeth Daily and Tim Curry

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg and Selena Gomez

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: George and Harold, a pair of elementary school pranksters, inadvertently transform their mean-spirited principal into a daring vigilante. Cartoon adventure based on the best-selling series of books, featuring the voices of Kevin Hart, Thomas Middleditch and Ed Helms

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: The animal-loving family heads for Africa, where Eliza discovers unscrupulous poachers are plotting to kill an entire herd of elephants with the aid of a deadly electric fence, leaving her and ever-present pal Darwin to save the day. Animated adventure, with the voices of Lacey Chabert, Tim Curry, Tom Kane, Cree Summer, Lynn Redgrave and Jodi Carlisle

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: A raccoon trickster is fretting about his debt to a fearsome bear when he stumbles on some animals waking in the woods after their winter nap. Spotting the chance to solve his problem, the raccoon dupes the gullible creatures into stealing food from a nearby suburb so he can give it to the bear - but they fail to realise they will soon be at the mercy of a vermin exterminator. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bruce Willis, Steve Carell, Garry Shandling and William Shatner

programme.title: The Swan Princess
programme.desc: A prince and princess have been expected to marry each other all their lives, a prospect they dreaded as children but which they came to look forward to as adults. However, an evil wizard captures the princess and turns her into a swan. Everyone else believes she is dead, but her betrothed sets out to bring her home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Michelle Nicastro, Jack Palance and John Cleese

programme.title: Noahs Ark
programme.desc: Tom and Vini are mice who stow away on Noahs ark. They must use their musical talents to enter a competition and help maintain peace among the animals. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Rodrigo Santoro and Marcelo Adnet

programme.title: Open Season: Scared Silly
programme.desc: Boog, Elliot and their pals team up to track down an elusive werewolf and prevent their forest from being intruded upon by hunter Shaw. Animation, with the voice of Will Townsend and Donny Lucas

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: An architect has a fling with a kooky waitress, who takes it upon herself to move into his house and pass herself off as his wife. When the woman he is actually in love with says she thinks the sham marriage is good for him, he decides to play along with the deception. Romantic comedy, starring Steve Martin, Goldie Hawn, Dana Delany, Donald Moffat and Julie Harris

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs the World
programme.desc: A directionless bassist meets the girl of his dreams, but finds that romancing her comes with a dangerous catch. She has seven evil ex-lovers, all endowed with tremendous fighting skills or superpowers - and before he can go out with her, he is expected to face each one in a battle to the death. Comedy adventure, starring Michael Cera, Mary Elizabeth Winstead and Jason Schwartzman

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Barton Academy boarding school teacher Paul Hunham incurs the wrath of headmaster Dr Hardy Woodrup by failing the son of a powerful senator. As punishment, Woodrup selects Paul to remain on campus over Christmas to chaperone the boys who wont be travelling home for the holidays. Alexander Paynes comedy drama, starring Paul Giamatti, DaVine Joy Randolph and Dominic Sessa

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancees latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: A lonely boy makes a wish at Christmas that his teddy bear will come to life, which is magically granted. The boy grows up to become a directionless slacker, with the foul-mouthed living toy still his inseparable friend - but his girlfriend thinks it is time for him to grow up. Comedy, starring Mark Wahlberg and Mila Kunis, directed by and featuring the voice of Seth MacFarlane

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: The foul-mouthed talking teddy bear is horrified to discover that he counts as property according to the law. He and his human best friend hire a pot-smoking lawyer to help them fight a court case and get Ted legally recognised as a person. Comedy sequel, starring Mark Wahlberg and Amanda Seyfried, with the voice of Seth MacFarlane

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: Three men on a stag weekend in Las Vegas wake up after a night of heavy drinking and find they have not only misplaced the groom, but somehow gained a tiger and a baby. Unable to remember the details of the night before, they set about piecing the clues together in the hope of finding their missing friend. Comedy, starring Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms and Zach Galifianakis

programme.title: The Hangover Part II
programme.desc: Phil, Stu and Alan reunite in Bangkok for another stag weekend, but having learned the lessons of their previous misadventures, resolve to keep this one quiet and alcohol-free. Things inevitably do not go according to plan, and they must once again piece together the events of a wild night they cannot remember. Comedy sequel, starring Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms and Zach Galifianakis

programme.title: The Hangover Part III
programme.desc: Drinking buddies Phil and Stu try to help their troubled friend Alan get his life in order, only to stumble into another bizarre misadventure. The Mob have taken Alans brother hostage and to free him, they have to track down manic gangster Mr Chow, who has escaped from a Thai prison. Comedy sequel, starring Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis and John Goodman

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Ten interlinked stories of people searching for and finding love. While the newly elected, bachelor British prime minister is smitten by a junior staff member at 10 Downing Street, a heartbroken writer heads for France to get over a failed relationship, and a faded rock star aims to reinvent himself in time for Christmas. Richard Curtiss romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Colin Firth, Bill Nighy and Liam Neeson

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two hapless Americans get caught up in the machinations of the Mob, and are forced to deliver a cash-stuffed envelope to a mysterious Mr Smith in a far corner of Australia - but a wily kangaroo bounds off with the money, leaving the friends desperate to retrieve it before the gangsters catch up with them. Comedy, starring Jerry OConnell, Christopher Walken, Anthony Anderson and Estella Warren

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: Anxious family man Gil Buckman is determined to have a better relationship with his three children than he had with his tough father. Elsewhere, his two sisters are also having family problems - one is struggling to understand her two troubled teenagers, while the others husband wants to turn their toddler into a child genius. Comedy drama, starring Steve Martin, Keanu Reeves, Mary Steenburgen, Jason Robards and Dianne Wiest

programme.title: The Cinema List: SNL
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, the Cinema List explores 50 years of films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A journalist desperate to be posted to a war zone encounters a special forces agent, who claims to have been part of a top-secret project to endow soldiers with superhuman powers. As the reporter joins the supposed psychic on a journey across Iraq, he discovers the bizarre story behind the experiment. Satirical comedy, starring George Clooney, Ewan McGregor, Jeff Bridges and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: Mr Deeds
programme.desc: A naive pizza parlour owner inherits $40billion and moves to New York, where he encounters unscrupulous opportunists keen to get their hands on the money - and a ruthless reporter determined to tell his story. Remake of 1936 romantic comedy Mr Deeds Goes to Town, with Adam Sandler, Winona Ryder, John Turturro, Allen Covert, Peter Gallagher and Jared Harris

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: Three men on a stag weekend in Las Vegas wake up after a night of heavy drinking and find they have not only misplaced the groom, but somehow gained a tiger and a baby. Unable to remember the details of the night before, they set about piecing the clues together in the hope of finding their missing friend. Comedy, starring Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms and Zach Galifianakis

programme.title: The Hangover Part II

Things inevitably do not go according to plan, and they must once again piece together the events of a wild night they cannot remember. Comedy sequel, starring Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms and Zach Galifianakis

programme.title: The Hangover Part III

The Mob have taken Alans brother hostage and to free him, they have to track down manic gangster Mr Chow, who has escaped from a Thai prison. Comedy sequel, starring Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis and John Goodman

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: When New York University professor Rachel Chu heads to Singapore with her boyfriend, Nick Young, shes surprised to learn hes from an extremely wealthy family. The problem is they arent so approving of her, so she attempts to win them over. Blockbusting comedy based on Kevin Kwans novel, starring Constance Wu, Henry Golding, Gemma Chan and Michelle Yeoh

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: Cynical, hard-drinking teacher Elizabeth Halsey hates her job and the kids in her class, and hopes to escape her daily grind by landing a rich husband. A wealthy substitute seems like a suitable candidate, but she has a rival for his attention in a squeaky-clean colleague. Comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Justin Timberlake, Jason Segel and Lucy Punch

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancees latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The cast of a cancelled sci-fi series are reduced to a life of conventions and public appearances, only to find themselves genuinely transported into space. Naive aliens have mistaken the show for real life and want the actors to help defend them from an evil extraterrestrial warlord. Sci-fi comedy, starring Tim Allen, Sigourney Weaver, Alan Rickman and Sam Rockwell

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two teenage friends are on the brink of going to different colleges, so decide to mark the event by going to a party where they hope to lose their virginity. However, they have promised to supply the booze for the event, a task that proves much harder than expected because they are under age. Unfortunately, when a friend steps in to help, the situation gets even worse. Comedy, starring Jonah Hill, Michael Cera and Christopher Mintz-Plasse

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: A power-crazed bully, a sleazy cocaine addict and a sexual predator each make an employees life a misery, but the three workers cannot afford to quit their jobs. They resort to desperate measures by conspiring to murder each others bosses, with a little help from an eccentric ex-convict. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A 14-year-old with a reputation for tall tales loses the sole copy of a story he has written for school - only for it to end up in the hands of a Hollywood producer. When the youngster realises it has been made into a blockbuster movie, he goes to Los Angeles with his best friend to claim a fair share of the profits - but when the movie executive refuses to do the right thing, they plan a fitting revenge. Comedy, with Frankie Muniz, Paul Giamatti and Amanda Bynes

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The discovery of an ancient relic leads the Ghostbusters old and new to join forces to stop a second ice age. Supernatural comedy adventure sequel, starring Paul Rudd, Carrie Coon, Mckenna Grace and Finn Wolfhard

programme.title: Look Whos Talking Too
programme.desc: Wisecracking toddler Mikey is joined by mischievous baby sister Julie and sibling rivalry inevitably erupts - while their parents have problems of their own to deal with, in the shape of the kids good-for-nothing uncle. Comedy sequel, starring John Travolta and Kirstie Alley, with the voices of Bruce Willis and Rosanne Barr

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freyas army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna. However, as war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara unite with Freya in an attempt to end Ravennas wicked reign once and for all. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Jessica Chastain.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The sewer-dwelling heroes discover their arch enemy Shredder has returned from another dimension, and made a deal with an alien warlord. Assisted by two mutant henchman, Shredder goes in search of a lost device that will allow his new ally to mount an invasion of Earth. Action adventure sequel, starring Megan Fox, Will Arnett and Stephen Amell

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: A reporter discovers four humanoid amphibians who live in the sewers of New York, and use their martial arts skills to fight crime. She helps them as they face their toughest challenge yet - defeating a sinister criminal organisation that seems to have power over the entire city. Fantasy adventure, starring Megan Fox and William Fichtner, with the voice of Johnny Knoxville

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller

programme.title: Look Whos Talking Now
programme.desc: A family takes in two pet dogs, a scruffy mongrel with discipline problems and a prim and proper pedigree poodle, whose personality clashes create all sorts of mayhem for the household. Comedy sequel, starring John Travolta and Kirstie Alley, plus the voices of Diane Keaton and Danny DeVito as the canine duo

programme.title: Big Fat Liar

Comedy, with Frankie Muniz, Paul Giamatti and Amanda Bynes

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A childrens football team competes in a world championship, but one member is left off the field to look after the canine mascot. When an evil plot emerges to sabotage the tournament, the quick-witted dog assembles the other mascots into a team to foil the villains responsible. Family adventure, starring Matthew James Roberts and Kristin Carey, with the voice of Rob Schneider

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: Musical based on The Wizard of Oz, featuring an all-black cast. Dorothy is suddenly whisked off to a magical land and makes some unusual friends as she tries to get back home, while avoiding the malevolent attentions of a wicked witch. Directed by Sidney Lumet, starring Diana Ross, Michael Jackson and Richard Pryor

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Peter Pan, who has finally grown up and is now a married lawyer with a family of his own, is whisked away by Tinkerbell to Neverland, where he must learn to fly again if he is to save his children from the clutches of Captain Hook. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure, with Robin Williams, Dustin Hoffman, Julia Roberts, Bob Hoskins and Maggie Smith

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two squabbling brothers with time on their hands decide to play a mysterious old board game after finding it in their basement. A chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive. Family sci-fi adventure, starring Josh Hutcherson, Jonah Bobo, Kristen Stewart, Tim Robbins and Dax Shepard.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freyas army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna. Directed by Sidney Lumet, starring Diana Ross, Michael Jackson and Richard Pryor

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: In a fantasy world where a fairy godmother endows each newborn with a special attribute, baby Ella is given the unwelcome gift of obedience. While growing up, she is magically compelled to do anything she is told to, and her stepmother takes great delight in forcing the girl to obey her every whim. So Ella sets out on a quest to find her fairy godmother and get her to take back her unwanted birthright. Fantasy adventure, starring Anne Hathaway, Hugh Dancy, Cary Elwes, Minnie Driver and Joanna Lumley

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: A Jewish lawyer looking forward to his retirement is pressured by his ailing mother to organise one last family holiday. Fulfilling her wish means reuniting his grown-up children, who have all gone their separate ways and cannot stand each other. Comedy drama, starring Timothy Spall, Honor Blackman, James Callis and Rhona Mitra

programme.title: The Cinema List: SNL
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, the Cinema List explores 50 years of films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: Recently widowed Bridget enters the dating game once again, caught between her sons science teacher and a man 20 years her junior. Romantic comedy, starring Renee Zellweger, Mila Jankovic, Hugh Grant and Colin Firth

programme.title: Bridget Joness Diary
programme.desc: A single woman begins a new year with resolutions to find love, quit her bad habits and take a step up the career ladder. Her plans crumble as she tries to deal with her mothers infidelity, get over a passionate fling with her boss and come to terms with her feelings for an uptight lawyer. Romantic comedy based on Helen Fieldings novel, starring Renee Zellweger, Hugh Grant and Colin Firth

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: The disaster-prone journalist seems to have finally found the perfect boyfriend. However, when the couple start to squabble over their personal habits, she decides to decamp for a while to Thailand and write a travelogue. Unfortunately, she has reckoned without the reappearance of a duplicitous old flame - and a spell behind bars in a Thai prison. Romantic comedy sequel, with Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth, Hugh Grant, Jim Broadbent and Gemma Jones

programme.title: Bridget Joness Baby
programme.desc: Bridgets focus on single life and her career is interrupted when she finds herself pregnant, but with one hitch - she can only be 50 per cent sure of the identity of her babys father after a pair of one-night stands. Is the dad old flame Mark Darcy or US dating guru Jack Qwant? Comedy sequel, starring Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth, Patrick Dempsey, Emma Thompson and Sally Phillips

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-Oct 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: An evil queen learns that her reign will last for ever if she kills a princess, so sends a renowned warrior to find and murder her. However, he comes to realise his mistresss evil ways, and instead trains his intended victim to fight so they can bring the tyrants rule to an end. Fantasy adventure, with Kristen Stewart, Chris Hemsworth and Charlize Theron

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freyas army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna. However, as war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara unite with Freya in an attempt to end Ravennas wicked reign once and for all. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Jessica Chastain.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula opens a luxury resort for monsters, to provide a refuge from terrified humans. His cosy sanctuary is disrupted when a normal man unwittingly checks in, and the situation is complicated when the unwanted guest takes a liking to the counts daughter. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Dracula is worried that his half-human grandson is not showing any vampiric tendencies, so enlists the help of his fellow monsters in showing the youngster how it is done. The count is shocked to receive an unwelcome visit from his own father, who does not approve of his sons tolerance of humans. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg and Selena Gomez

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: Magical beings from folklore, including Santa Claus, Jack Frost and the Easter Bunny, join forces to defeat the plans of an evil spirit, who intends to steal the dreams of children and use the power they grant him to dominate the world. Animated adventure, with the voices of Chris Pine, Alec Baldwin, Hugh Jackman, Isla Fisher and Jude Law

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: A power-crazed bully, a sleazy cocaine addict and a sexual predator each make an employees life a misery, but the three workers cannot afford to quit their jobs. They resort to desperate measures by conspiring to murder each others bosses, with a little help from an eccentric ex-convict. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: Under heavy pressure from her father, Beca reluctantly starts her first year at Barden University and gets an internship at the school radio station. She soon acquires a new circle of friends in the form of a band of misfits with a shared talent for singing, joining their a cappella group and trying to inject some much needed energy into their repertoire. Comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Brittany Snow, Anna Camp, Rebel Wilson and Skylar Astin

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: A Cappella group the Barden Bellas enjoy an unprecedented run of success, until a disastrous performance sees them banned from national competitions and beset by scandal. They attempt to turn their fortunes around and redeem their reputation by competing in the World Championships of A Cappella in Copenhagen. Comedy sequel, starring Anna Kendrick and Rebel Wilson

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Following their win at the world championship, the now-separated Bellas (an all-female a cappella singing group) reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour. However, they face a squad who uses both instruments and voices. Final part of the blockbusting comedy trilogy, starring Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Brittany Snow

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: An expedition to find King Solomons diamond mines in the jungles of the Congo disappears without trace. The tycoon behind the mission sends his assistant, a former CIA agent, to find out what became of the explorers - only to discover that the party met a grisly fate at the hands of a horde of vicious apes. Action adventure based on Michael Crichtons novel, with Dylan Walsh, Laura Linney, Tim Curry and Grant Heslov

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: Anxious family man Gil Buckman is determined to have a better relationship with his three children than he had with his tough father. Elsewhere, his two sisters are also having family problems - one is struggling to understand her two troubled teenagers, while the others husband wants to turn their toddler into a child genius. Comedy drama, starring Steve Martin, Keanu Reeves, Mary Steenburgen, Jason Robards and Dianne Wiest

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: After a whirlwind night of romance with a terminally ill man, a woman commits to helping him spend his last days living life to the fullest. Drama, starring Isabelle Fuhrman, Mena Massoud, Jennifer Grey and Kelsey Grammer. Co-written, produced and directed by Julia Stiles

programme.title: Code 3
programme.desc: On his final shift, a burned-out paramedic has to train his keen but inexperienced replacement. What begins as a routine night soon descends into a chaotic, citywide odyssey that tests their endurance. Co-writer/director Christopher Leones action comedy, starring Rainn Wilson, Lil Rel Howery and Aimee Carrero

programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: After a young girl bursts into their home psychiatry practice claiming an entity is feeding on her, Jordan and her clairvoyant mother must find a way to stop the evil. Horror, starring Shawn Ashmore and Ashley Greene

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: Recently widowed Bridget enters the dating game once again, caught between her sons science teacher and a man 20 years her junior. Romantic comedy, starring Renee Zellweger, Mila Jankovic, Hugh Grant and Colin Firth

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: After a family barricade themselves inside their remote farmhouse when a creature attacks, a father slowly transforms into something unrecognisable. Werewolf horror from The Invisible Man director Leigh Whannell, starring Christopher Abbott, Julia Garner, Matilda Firth and Sam Jaeger

programme.title: Novocaine
programme.desc: When the woman of his dreams is kidnapped, a man turns an inability to feel physical pain into an unexpected advantage in his quest to rescue her. Action comedy, starring Jack Quaid, Ray Nicholson and Amber Midthunder

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: In 1838 Germany, Thomas Hutter is sent to the Carpathian mountains to secure the signature of enigmatic nobleman Count Orlok on a property sale in the German city of Wisborg. Thomas leaves his bride Ellen in the care of friend Friedrich Harding and his wife Anna. The young man barely survives the exhausting trip to Europe and stumbles home to find Ellen driven to delirium by a telepathic bond to the Count. Director Robert Eggers version of the Dracula-inspired horror, starring Bill Skarsgard, Lily-Rose Depp, Nicholas Hoult and Aaron Taylor-Johnson

programme.title: Panda Plan
programme.desc: An international action superstar gets involved in a rescue operation of a beloved zoo panda named Hu Hu. Chinese comedy, starring Jackie Chan and Xiang Wei, with subtitles

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-Oct 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: An estate agent is pulled back into the life he left behind after his former partner-in-crime resurfaces with an ominous message. Action comedy, starring Ke Huy Quan, Ariana DeBose, Mustafa Shakir and Lio Tipton

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the houses secrets and end the bloodshed. Horror starring Tanner Stine and Kaylee Kaneshiro

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: An estate agent is pulled back into the life he left behind after his former partner-in-crime resurfaces with an ominous message. Action comedy, starring Ke Huy Quan, Ariana DeBose, Mustafa Shakir and Lio Tipton

programme.title: Restore Point
programme.desc: In central Europe during 2041, a female detective investigates the case of a slain couple where a restoration team is able to bring one of them back to life. Sci-fi thriller, starring Andrea Mohylova, Matej Hádek and Milan Ondrík

programme.title: Kill
programme.desc: Three brothers return to the remote woodland where they killed their abusive father, only to discover his shallow grave is now empty. Thriller, starring Daniel Portman, Brian Vernel and Paul Higgins

programme.title: Escape from the 21st Century
programme.desc: In 1999, after discovering they have the power to travel in time with every sneeze, three friends embark on an adventure to save the world. Fantasy adventure, starring Ruoyun Zhang and Elane Zhong. In Chinese and Mandarin, with English subtitles

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Years after two enemy pilots land on a mysterious unchartered island in the Pacific, a team of scientists embark on a top-secret mission to the same region. Things soon descend into chaos when the local wildlife proves far from welcoming, and they must battle to escape from the domain of the mighty Kong. Action adventure, starring Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L Jackson and Brie Larson

programme.title: If You Were the Last
programme.desc: Adrift in their broken shuttle with little hope of rescue, two astronauts argue over whether theyre better off spending their remaining days as friends or something more. Romantic comedy, starring Anthony Mackie and Zoe Chao

programme.title: Jules
programme.desc: Residents of a small Pennsylvania town are disturbed when a UFO crashes into a back garden. Director Marc Turtletaubs comedy drama, starring Ben Kingsley, Harriet Harris and Jane Curtin

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Ancient titans Godzilla and Kong clash in an epic battle against an undiscovered threat hidden within the Earth. Director Adam Wingards blockbusting fantasy adventure, starring Rebecca Hall, Dan Stevens and Brian Tyree Henry

programme.title: AI: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A highly advanced robotic boy is created with one purpose - to love his owner as a parent. When he is rejected by his mother, he is left to roam the bleak landscapes of a futuristic America with a fellow android, searching for a means of becoming a real boy in the hope of regaining her love. Steven Spielbergs sci-fi drama, starring Haley Joel Osment, Jude Law, William Hurt and Frances OConnor

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: A deep-space salvage crew investigate mysterious events aboard a hi-tech spaceship, which suddenly reappeared in orbit around Neptune after going missing for seven years - but it is not long before they are exposed to terror beyond their wildest nightmares. Sci-fi horror, starring Laurence Fishburne, Sam Neill, Kathleen Quinlan, Joely Richardson and Sean Pertwee

programme.title: Resident Evil: Retribution
programme.desc: Zombie fighter Alice finds herself trapped in a top-secret underground base as a virus sweeps the world, turning the human race into the undead. She battles through the complex in search of those responsible for the outbreak and faces an old friend, now under the control of her enemies. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Sienna Guillory and Michelle Rodriguez

programme.title: Restore Point
programme.desc: In central Europe during 2041, a female detective investigates the case of a slain couple where a restoration team is able to bring one of them back to life. Sci-fi thriller, starring Andrea Mohylova, Matej Hádek and Milan Ondrík

programme.title: Kill
programme.desc: Three brothers return to the remote woodland where they killed their abusive father, only to discover his shallow grave is now empty. Thriller, starring Daniel Portman, Brian Vernel and Paul Higgins

programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: Daniel and Lacy Barretts relatively peaceful existence is disturbed when strange things begin to happen around their suburban home. As the situation escalates, the couple become convinced they are being tormented by alien visitors, but when they get in touch with an expert in extraterrestrial activity, they realise their ordeal has only just begun. Sci-fi horror, starring Keri Russell, Josh Hamilton and Dakota Goyo.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: A cop is murdered in the line of duty by his crooked partner, and ends up recruited by a supernatural police force. Teaming up with a Wild West lawman, he is sent back to Earth to prevent ghosts from causing chaos and uncovers a plot to overrun the land of the living with evil spirits. Fantasy adventure, with Ryan Reynolds and Jeff Bridges

programme.title: AI: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A highly advanced robotic boy is created with one purpose - to love his owner as a parent. When he is rejected by his mother, he is left to roam the bleak landscapes of a futuristic America with a fellow android, searching for a means of becoming a real boy in the hope of regaining her love. Steven Spielbergs sci-fi drama, starring Haley Joel Osment, Jude Law, William Hurt and Frances OConnor

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Ancient titans Godzilla and Kong clash in an epic battle against an undiscovered threat hidden within the Earth. Director Adam Wingards blockbusting fantasy adventure, starring Rebecca Hall, Dan Stevens and Brian Tyree Henry

programme.title: Unhinged
programme.desc: Following a minor road-rage incident, single mother Rachel is terrorised by a seemingly mentally ill stranger. She finds herself and everyone she loves the target of a man who feels invisible and is looking to make one last mark upon the world by teaching her a series of deadly lessons. Psychological thriller, starring Russell Crowe and Caren Pistorius

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman survives a car crash, and wakes up to find herself in an underground bunker, belonging to a survivalist who claims that a devastating attack has left the outside world uninhabitable. As his behaviour becomes increasingly stranger, she begins to fear she is being tricked and resolves to discover the truth for herself. Thriller, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead and John Goodman

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: A drifter in a post-apocalyptic wasteland encounters a crazed, sadistic warlord and his radiation-afflicted cult. He assists a warrior who has turned against the tyrant, and liberates five women who have been forced to become his brides. Together, they make a desperate journey through the desert to salvation, with their enemies in hot pursuit. Reboot of the sci-fi thriller franchise, starring Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: A man wakes from a coma to discover Britain has been struck by a terrifying experimental virus that sends victims into a homicidal rage. With a handful of other survivors, he heads for Manchester, the last outpost unaffected by the outbreak - but realises the virus is not the only threat. Danny Boyles horror, starring Cillian Murphy, Naomie Harris, Brendan Gleeson and Christopher Eccleston

programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Amnesiac soldier Alice prepares for her last stand-off with the evil Umbrella Corporation. Action horror sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Ali Larter, Shawn Roberts and Ruby Rose

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: A cop is murdered in the line of duty by his crooked partner, and ends up recruited by a supernatural police force. Teaming up with a Wild West lawman, he is sent back to Earth to prevent ghosts from causing chaos and uncovers a plot to overrun the land of the living with evil spirits. Fantasy adventure, with Ryan Reynolds and Jeff Bridges

programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: Daniel and Lacy Barretts relatively peaceful existence is disturbed when strange things begin to happen around their suburban home. As the situation escalates, the couple become convinced they are being tormented by alien visitors, but when they get in touch with an expert in extraterrestrial activity, they realise their ordeal has only just begun. Sci-fi horror, starring Keri Russell, Josh Hamilton and Dakota Goyo.

programme.title: Some Other Woman
programme.desc: While visiting an island for her husbands work, a woman meets a stranger who takes over her life. Thriller, starring Ashley Greene, Brooke Lyons and Tom Felton. Directed by Joel David Moore, better known as one of the stars of the Avatar films

programme.title: Dangerous Waters
programme.desc: A sailing trip turns into a nightmare when a woman uncovers the dark past of her mothers new boyfriend. Thriller, starring Odeya Rush, Eric Dane, Saffron Burrows and Ray Liotta in one of his final films

programme.title: Amongst the Wolves
programme.desc: An ex-soldier meets a teen fleeing a gang, an encounter which forces them to confront their pasts while navigating present realities. Director Mark OConnors thriller, starring Luke McQuillan, Aidan Gillen and Daniel Fee

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A retired secret agent applies his talents to the task of helping victims of injustice. When he witnesses a prostitute being beaten up by a pimp, he kills the man, an act that draws him into a battle to the death with a Russian crime syndicate. Action thriller based on the 1980s TV series, starring Denzel Washington and Chloe Grace Moretz

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA analyst gets caught up in the Colombian drug trade while trying to track down terrorists responsible for the murder of a close friend of the US president - but his investigations point to illegal activity and corruption at the very top of government. Action thriller, based on Tom Clancys novel, with Harrison Ford reprising his role from Patriot Games alongside Willem Dafoe, Anne Archer and James Earl Jones

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Maverick San Francisco detective Dirty Harry Callahan sets out to capture a deranged sniper picking off victims at random. Although his own tactics barely stay within the confines of the law, he is determined the killer will face his particular brand of justice, regardless of his superiors disapproval. Don Siegels thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, Harry Guardino and Andy Robinson

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Following his life-or-death missions in The Da Vinci Code, and Angels and Demons, long suffering expert Robert Langdon awakes with amnesia in an Italian hospital, and is soon on the run with a beautiful doctor. Racing to stop a devastating virus, the symbologist suffers shocking visions as an assassin closes in. Director Ron Howards conversion of the Dan Brown thriller, starring Tom Hanks, Felicity Jones and Irrfan Khan

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Truck driver Johnny is inspired to establish the Vandals motorcycle club in 1960s Chicago. He assembles a motley crew, including Brucie, Benny, Cal and Zipco. Exuberant outsider Kathy falls under Bennys spell, and they marry, but when the groom is the victim of a violent assault, Johnny exacts revenge, while Kathy fights for her husbands tormented soul. Drama, starring Tom Hardy, Jodie Comer and Austin Butler

programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: An idealistic undercover cop in 1960s New York is ostracised by his fellow officers for his refusal to take bribes. Sickened by the widespread corruption in the force and the refusal of his superiors to do anything, he sets out to publicly expose the guilty parties, putting his own life on the line in the process. Fact-based drama directed by Sidney Lumet, starring Al Pacino and John Randolph

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A man is forced to witness the murder of his wife and daughter, and is driven to despair when one of the perpetrators walks free at trial. Years later, he begins a campaign of vigilante violence, seeking revenge on the killers and the justice system that failed to punish them, particularly an assistant district attorney who allowed the defendant to make a deal during the court proceedings. Thriller, with Gerard Butler and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Escape from Alcatraz
programme.desc: A cunning convict with a history of making escape attempts is transferred to the notorious high-security island prison off the California coast, from which no one has ever broken out. Continually at odds with the brutal warden, he and three fellow prisoners hatch a plan to make it to freedom on an improvised raft. Thriller, based on a true story, starring Clint Eastwood, Patrick McGoohan, Roberts Blossom and Fred Ward

programme.title: Some Other Woman
programme.desc: While visiting an island for her husbands work, a woman meets a stranger who takes over her life. Thriller, starring Ashley Greene, Brooke Lyons and Tom Felton. Directed by Joel David Moore, better known as one of the stars of the Avatar films

programme.title: Dangerous Waters
programme.desc: A sailing trip turns into a nightmare when a woman uncovers the dark past of her mothers new boyfriend. Thriller, starring Odeya Rush, Eric Dane, Saffron Burrows and Ray Liotta in one of his final films

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: The disappearance of an eight-year-old girl ties together a series of past deaths and disappearances, as well as bringing the truth about a broken familys history into the light. Thriller written and directed by Logan George and Celine Held, starring Dylan OBrien and Eliza Scanlen

programme.title: Greedy People
programme.desc: A rookie cop is partnered with an unhinged and morally dubious local officer in a small island town. A murder and the discovery of a million dollars soon turns the local communitys lives upside down. Director Potsy Poncirolis comedy, starring Himesh Patel, Lily James and Joseph Gordon-Levitt

Thriller, based on a true story, starring Clint Eastwood, Patrick McGoohan, Roberts Blossom and Fred Ward

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agents nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersens thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: The skipper of a fishing boat and his crew ignore severe weather warnings and head for a dangerous area of the North Atlantic in search of the last lucrative catch of the season, but end up fighting for survival in the worst storm of the 20th century. Fact-based disaster drama, with George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg, Diane Lane, John C Reilly and Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: Colonel Katherine Powells mission to wipe out a terrorist cell in Kenya is complicated when a girl enters the blast radius of the intended drone strike. Powell has to decide between sacrificing the girls life or letting the terrorists flee to carry out more atrocities. Thriller, starring Helen Mirren, Alan Rickman and Aaron Paul

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: Four magicians use their lavish stage shows as cover for a series of seemingly impossible heists, and give away the money they steal to their audiences. An FBI agent assembles a team of experts to discover how the baffling robberies are committed and what the secret agenda behind the crime spree is. Crime thriller, starring Jesse Eisenberg, Mark Ruffalo, Woody Harrelson and Isla Fisher

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Three brothers run an underground bootlegging operation in Depression-era Virginia. However, as their criminal activities become increasingly successful, a corrupt deputy sheriff demands a cut of the profits, forcing them to fight to defend their livelihood. Crime drama, starring Shia LaBeouf, Tom Hardy, Jason Clarke, Gary Oldman and Guy Pearce

programme.title: Contraband
programme.desc: Successful international smuggler Chris Farraday turns his back on a life of crime to raise a family. However, his brother-in-law crosses a powerful drug lord, who forces Chris to transport billions of dollars of counterfeit money into the US, or his wife and children will be killed. Crime thriller, starring Mark Wahlberg, Kate Beckinsale, Giovanni Ribisi and Ben Foster

programme.sub-title: A Little Weed and a Bad Seed
programme.desc: There are problems on Beverly Roses first day of nursery. Becky and Darlene fall out and Harris offers a solution for Dans back pain

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Dan encourages the family to decorate the house for Halloween. Harris takes a stand on an issue that ruffles a few feathers

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Spencer tries to broker a peace deal between Travis and one of his most ardent critics. Elsewhere, Charles struggles to adjust to his new role. Comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Andre and Spencers rivalry reaches a new level when Andre makes a visit to the office. Meanwhile, Charles tries to keep Ricky in Miami. Comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Spencer is forced to ask for help during his draft day party, while keeping some of ASMs latest developments on the down low. Comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: Selina deals with potential adversaries and allies whilst away at an Aspen retreat. Elsewhere, Amys behaviour raises Garys suspicions

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: In the run-up to the first debate, Selina makes a novel campaign proposal. Meanwhile, comments by Jonah cause a stir, and Dan and Amy take a road trip

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: Selina seeks an endorsement from a key leader as her campaign trail hits South Carolina. Meanwhile, Gary is finally handed a long-awaited promotion

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Carrie struggles to deal with her feelings about motherhood and new relationship with Aleksandr. Charlotte babysits Brady while Miranda and Steve go on honeymoon, and Samantha uses all her public relations influence to obtain an appointment with a doctor

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Charlottes attempts to escape the pain of childlessness lead to an encounter with a small bundle of joy. Samantha tries a bold new look and Carrie is taken aback by Aleksandrs tastes. Meanwhile, Miranda goes above and beyond the call of duty to make Steve happy

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: While New York shivers in a cold snap, Carrie and Aleksandr bed down to keep each other warm - but the prolonged exposure prompts the romantically confused columnist to question their relationship yet again. Samantha is distressed to hear rumours about Smiths sexual orientation and takes drastic action to silence the gossips. Charlotte decides to put her pampered pooch on show, and Miranda struggles to make her house feel like a home

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Aleksandr finally meets the girls, but is taken aback by Samanthas frank discussion at the dinner table. Carrie reassesses her priorities after the sudden death of a former It girl, and her shock announcement looks set to cause irreparable damage - and even signal the end of the foursomes friendship. Comedy, starring Sarah Jessica Parker

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.sub-title: An American Girl in Paris - Part Une
programme.desc: Part one of two. It looks to be the end of an era as Carrie prepares to bid farewell to her New York life, heading instead for the chic salons and cafes of Paris with lover Aleksandr. However, there are a few loose ends to tie up before she can go, plus a last dinner with the girls. But an unexpected encounter with a familiar face may make her think twice about jetting off to pastures new

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Will receives a piano from Grace to cement their friendship, and Jack deals with a relationship break-up by writing homoerotic novels - which have an interesting effect on Karen. American comedy, starring Eric McCormack and Debra Messing

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: A new neighbours habits upset Grace, so she dispenses some romantic advice, hoping it will help him return to his girlfriend. Will and Jack struggle to decide what to do when Karen dumps her elderly mother-in-law on them. Woody Harrelson guest stars

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.sub-title: Alice Doesnt Lisp Here Any More
programme.desc: Jack is nominated for an award and Grace is racked with feelings of guilt while attending the funeral of a schoolmate she used to tease for having a lisp. American sitcom, starring Sean Hayes and Debra Messing

programme.title: Will and Grace

programme.title: Tina (2021)
programme.desc: Born Anna Mae Bullock in 1939, Tina Turner has sold in excess of 100 million records and earned numerous plaudits including Grammy awards and induction into the Rock And Roll Hall Of Fame with her first husband, Ike Turner. She was the first woman to grace the cover of Rolling Stone magazine and dabbled in acting including a memorable performance opposite Mel Gibson in Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome. Following a prolonged period of ill health, Turner intends to retire from the spotlight with her second husband, Erwin Bach. She bids farewell to her fans in the emotional documentary Tina. Directed by Dan Lindsay and TJ Martin, the film invites the singer to reminisce about her turbulent life and career with glowing contributions from friends, family and fans including Oprah Winfrey and Angela Bassett

programme.desc: In Ireland, the notion of the fairy folk dates back thousands of years and originates with stories of powerful shining beings who came down from the sky. Giorgio Tsoukalos explores whether these tales have been inspired by ancient alien visitation

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Giorgio Tsoukalos reveals that in the nearly 2,000-year-old text called The Zohar there is a curious passage that describes seven Earths - each of which is said to be populated by both human and non-human intelligences

programme.title: Hitlers British Island
programme.desc: Part one of two. How the Channel Island of Alderney became a pre-occupation of Nazi leader Adolf Hitler and under German control was transformed into one of the most heavily fortified places on Earth. Away from prying eyes, the Nazis also established a concentration camp - the only one on British soil - amid the idyllic scenery of woodlands and silver sand beaches

programme.title: Hitlers British Island
programme.desc: Part two of two. On the orders of Adolf Hitler, the Nazi invaders of Alderney, a tiny island in the English Channel, shipped in more than 5,000 slave labourers to build an astonishing series of fortifications designed to protect the island from attack

programme.title: Combat Trains
programme.desc: Documentary series exploring the role of trains in the major conflicts of the past 150 years. This instalment looks into how the efficiency of the rail networks on both sides helped cause the stalemate of the First World War

programme.title: Inside the Tower of London
programme.desc: Examining the execution of German spies captured in the two world wars. Theres a profile of suffragette Leonora Cohen, who took aim at the crown jewels to publicise her cause. Theres a look back to 2014, when the Tower hosted a display of nearly 900,000 ceramic poppies in the moat for Remembrance Day. In the Royal Armouries after dark, curator Bridget examines a telling reminder of the horrors of war. Plus, another new recruit joins the Beefeaters

programme.title: Inside the Tower of London
programme.desc: Cameras follow Chris, the ancient structures Raven Master, and General Nicholas Houghton, former Chief of Defence staff and current Constable of the Tower. Plus, a look at the original document which reveals how brutally Guy Fawkes was tortured

programme.title: Britains Most Historic Towns
programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts is in Glasgow to investigate the impact of steam power on Britains major towns in the 18th and 19th centuries. She also learns about the arrival of migrant workers in the city and how the insanitary conditions in which they lived, which made Glasgow both a hotbed of disease and a place of great medical advancement. Aerial archaeologist Ben Robinson flies his drone over Loch Katrine as he tells the story of how Victorian engineers overcame geographical barriers to bring fresh drinking water to the workers of Glasgow

programme.title: Alien Files: Unsealed
programme.desc: Experts examine the possibility that life began on Mars and travelled to Earth, and assess the plans aliens may have in store for the human race if they really do exist

programme.title: Alien Files: Unsealed
programme.desc: Experts open previously off-limits secret files in a bid to answer some of the most mysterious questions surrounding UFOs and extraterrestrial life

programme.title: Combat Trains
programme.desc: From the trench to the home-front hospital, a medical historian retraces the train journey made by wounded soldiers during the Second World War. Documentary series exploring the role of trains in the major conflicts of the past 150 years

programme.title: Combat Trains
programme.desc: The astonishing accounts of four railway journeys that changed history, including the perilous expedition that made a young Winston Churchill world famous

programme.title: Invasion: The Normans
programme.desc: Two-part documentary exploring the Anglo-Norman invasion of Ireland. The first edition opens in the turmoil of 12th-century Ireland, where provincial kings compete for supremacy. When two of these power players drive a rival into exile, he seeks help from Henry II, the Anglo-Norman king of England. Henrys vassal Strongbow and other Norman allies then invade Ireland

programme.title: Invasion: The Normans
programme.desc: The second of the two-part documentary follows the course of the invasion, as Strongbow wins victory after victory. In 1171 Henry II arrived to takes control of Ireland, and he granted land there to settlers from Britain. Now archaeology and cutting-edge science reveal their fascinating lives. The episode also shows how the conquest of Ireland enabled centuries of war between England and France

programme.title: Clash of Ancient Warriors
programme.desc: The Battle of the Catalaunian Plains, fought in 451, between the Huns under Attila and a mixed Roman and Visigoth force under Aetius and Theodoric I. The terrible battle ended in a bloodbath, with no clear victory

programme.title: The Other 300: Army of Lovers
programme.desc: Elite Greek army the Sacred Band, which was formed by the city of Thebes in 379BCE to defend itself from Sparta. Fighting for four decades undefeated, the army was annihilated by the forces of Philip II of Macedon and his son Alexander in the Battle of Chaeronea. Buried on the battlefield where they fell, the 300 were forgotten by history until a 19th century excavation uncovered their mass grave. However, the discovery was never published, and the evidence was lost. This documentary brings their story to light

programme.desc: In Ireland, the notion of the fairy folk dates back thousands of years and originates with stories of powerful shining beings who came down from the sky. Giorgio Tsoukalos explores whether these tales have been inspired by ancient alien visitation
